loans.name: Celia Ibeth

texts.es: La Sra. Celia Ibeth G. E. es trabajadora Activa del colegio público “Los E.” San Pablo desempeñándose como Maestra de Educación Primaria tiene Veinte y tres  años de trabajar para esta institución. Ha tenido  ocho  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando para ampliarle un cuarto más a su casa de habitación, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Celia Ibeth G. E. is an employee at the “Los E.” public school in San Pablo, working as a primary school teacher.  She has worked at this school for twenty-three years.  She has had eight credits with CEPRODEL, and used each one to buy construction materials to expand and improve her home.  She is requesting this loan to add another room.  The loans with CEPRODEL have greatly benefited her, as they have allowed her to improve her and her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase sand, cement, stone, cinder blocks.

loans.name: Jose Elias

texts.es:
El señor Jose Elias P. es trabajador de La Alcaldia de Chinandega se desempeña como operario de limpieza desde el año 2007 y lleva con CEPRODEL 06 creditos, es acompañado con 3 hijos todos en edades escolares.
Don Jose Elias solicita credito para cubrir con gastos escolares de sus hijos ya que se acerca fin de año y tiene un hijo que culmina sus estudios de primaria,es muy responsable en su pago y se le deduce a traves del convenio por la Alcaldia de Chinandega.
texts.en:
José Elias P. works at the Mayor's Office of Chinandega.  He has been a cleaner there since 2007 and he has had six loans with CEPRODEL.  He lives with his 3 school-age children.

Jose Elias is requesting this loan to cover his children's school expenses since the end of the year is approaching and he has a son who is finishing his elementary school studies.  He is very responsible with his payments which are deducted in agreement with the Mayor's Office of Chinandega.

loans.use: Gastos personales

loans.name: Julio Ariel

texts.es: JULIO ARIEL T. M.,Trabaja como Higienista en  Commema  en el Mercado Candelaria de Managua, es padre de familia de un niño y este se encuentra en e dad escolar, el prestamo solicitado es para la compra de materiales electricos para su casa de habitacion.
texts.en: Julio Ariel T. M. works as a cleaner for Commema (Corporación Municipal de Mercados de Managua) in Managua's Candelaria Market.  He has one school-age child. The loan which he is requesting will be used to buy electrical materials for his house.

loans.use: To improve his house, replacing his electrical system

loans.name: Amelia Del Carmen

texts.es: La Sra. Amelia del Carmen C. V. es trabajadora Activa del colegio público “Monte limar” desempeñándose como Maestra de Educación Primaria tiene doce  años de trabajar para esta institución. Ha tenido  doce   créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando para la compra de dos bovinos para el destace de res ya que se está dedicando al negocio del destace, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Amelia del Carmen C. V. works as an elementary school teacher at 'Monte limar' school.  She has been working there for twelve years.  She has had twelve loans with CEPRODEL and each one has been used to buy building materials for extending and improving her house.  This loan will be used to buy two cows for butchering since her business is butchering cows.  Her CEPRODEL loans have greatly benefited her since they have helped her improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Jose Maria

texts.es:
El señor Jose Maria B. C. es trabajador de la Alcaldia de Chinandega con quienes se firmo convenio para deducciones de salario quincenalmente, el señor habita carretera a Leon, se desempeña como Vigilante y tiene 11 años de laborar, es casado con 01 hijo y su esposa trabaja lavando y planchando.

El Señor B. C. solicito credito para  compra de una motocicleta de segunda para transportarse de su casa a su trabajo, pues le queda bastante retirado, lleva ya 04 creditos con CEPRODEL y ha demostrado ser muy responsable.
texts.en:
Jose Maria B. C. works at the Mayor's Office in Chinandega.  He has an arrangement with them whereby they deduct his repayments from his salary every two weeks.  He lives on the road to León.  He works as a watchman and has been working for 11 years.  He is married with one child and his wife works washing and ironing.

Mr B. C. is requesting this loan to buy a second-hand motorbike so that he can get to and from work since he is quite far away.  He has already had 4 loans with CEPRODEL and has shown himself to be very responsible.

loans.use: Personal expenses

loans.name: Arely Sugey

texts.es:
La Joven Arely Sugey C. P. es comerciante se dedica a la venta de sopas de Res y de Mondongo, es madre soltera de un niño de 02 años de edad, habita en el barrio San Agustin, vive con sus padres, lleva 22 creditos con CEPRODEL y tiene desde el 2006.
Arely C. P. ha demostrado ser una persona muy cumplida con sus obligaciones.
texts.en:
Young Arely Sugey C. P. is a merchant who sells 'sopas de res' (a traditional meat stew) and 'sopas de Mondongo' (tripe stew).  She is a single mother and has one 2 year-old son.  She lives in the San Agustin neighborhood with her parents.  She has had 22 loans from CEPRODEL since 2006.

Arely C. P. has shown herself to be very responsible with her payments.

loans.use: Purchase of ingredients

loans.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es: El señor Juan Manuel J. O. es trabajador de la Alcaldia de Chinandega donde tenemos un Convenio con cuotas deducibles de salaries quincenalmente, se desempeña en le area de Auditor Fiscal, tiene 5 años de trabajar en la Alcaldia y lleva 03 años de trabajar con CEPRODEL y ha obtenido 05 credito, es casado su esposa trabaja tambien en la Alcaldia de Chinandega tienen 01 hijo en edad escolar y ambos han logrado independisar su familia, esta vez solicito credito para cubrir unos gastos de medicamentos, ya que no le cubria el seguro social.
texts.en:
Juan Manuel J. O. works for the Alcaldia de Chinandega (Chinandega City council), which has an agreement in place with CEPRODEL whereby forthnightly repayments come straight from the salaries paid. 

Juan Manuel works as a tax consultant. He has worked for the council for 5 years. In his 3 years with CEPRODEL he has obtained 5 loans. He is married and his wife also works for the Chinandega council. They have a son of school age. They have managed to make their family financially independent. He requests a loan to pay for medicines not covered by the social insurance.

loans.use: Buy medicines.

loans.name: Oneyda Del Carmen

texts.es:
ONEYDA DEL CARMEN M. L.,Trabaja como Colectora en el Mercado Oriental de Managua, es madre dos hijos pero actualmente estos no estan estudiando, ha trabajado seis prestamos con la institucion y estos han sido para el mejoramiento de la vivienda.
 el prestamo solicitado espara comprar verjas para las ventanas de su casa de habitacion.
texts.en: Oneyda del Carmen M. L. works as a collector in the Mercado Oriental market in Managua.  She is mother to two children but they are not currently in school.  She has had six loans from the organization which have been used to improve her house.  The loan she is currently requesting will be used to buy grilles for the windows of her house.

loans.use: To improve her house, replacing window grilles

loans.name: Mercedes Donaldo

texts.es: El Sr. Mercedes Donaldo C. P. es trabajador Activo de la  Alcaldía Municipal San Rafael del Sur desempeñándose como Guarda de Seguridad tiene un año de trabajar para esta institución, es casado actualmente tiene dos hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de  materiales para siembra  y preparase para dicha siembra porque él se dedica a parte de su trabajo a la siembra de frijol, maíz, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Mr Mercedes Donaldo C. P. works for the City of San Rafael del Sur.  He is a security guard.  He has been working there for one year.  He is married and has two school-age children.  He has had two loans from CEPRODEL and each one has been used to buy equipment for sowing and preparing for sowing time because in addition to his job, he sows beans and corn.  His loans with CEPRODEL have greatly benefited him since they have helped him improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: Supplies for sowing corn

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To improve and repair her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To improve his house. To buy cement and iron to finish a wall

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
La Señora Maria Luisa es comerciante posee  un mini bar de Golosinas en la Escuela San Agustin de Chinandega, Habita en el barrio San Agustin, lleva ya 39 creditos con CEPRODEL los cuales los ha pagado en tiempo y forma exacta.

Doña Maria Luisa es Casada con tres hijos pero todos dependen por si solos ya son mayors de edades, ademas de tener su mini bar riega al creditos prendas y cobertores.
texts.en:
Mrs Maria Luisa is a merchant.  She owns a snack bar selling sweets at San Agustin school in Chinandega.  She lives in the San Agustin neighborhood and has had 39 loans from CEPRODEL which have all been paid on time and in full.

Maria Luisa is married and has three children.  All of her children are grown up and are no longer dependent on her.  In addition to running her snack bar, she also sells clothes and bedspreads on credit.

loans.use: To buy products

loans.name: Nahima Del Carmen

texts.es: La Sra. Nahima del Carmen G. M. es trabajadora Activa de la  Alcaldía Municipal San Rafael del Sur desempeñándose como secretaria tiene catorce años de trabajar para esta institución, es casada actualmente. Ha tenido  cuatro  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo esta solicitando para gastos personales en su hogar, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella  ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Mrs Nahima del Carmen G. M. works for the City of San Rafael del Sur as a secretary.  She has been working for them for fourteen years.  She is married.  She has had four loans from CEPRODEL and each one has been used to buy building materials to extend and improve her house.  She is requesting her current loan for personal household expenses.  Her loans with CEPRODEL have greatly benefited her since they have enabled her to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: Personal expenses

loans.name: :   Santos Pablo

texts.es: SANTOS PABLO R. R.,Trabaja como Higienista en Commema mercado Oriental de Managua.   es padre de familia de cinco j¡hijos dos se encuentran en el colegio, ha trabajado ocho prestamos con ceprodel y estos han sido para el mejoramiento de su vivienda, el prestamo solicitado  es para la compra de pliegos de zinc y madera para el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en: Santos Pablo R. R. works as a cleaner for Commema (Corporación Municipal de Mercados de Managua) in Managua's Mercado Oriental market.  He is the father of five children who all attend school.  He has had eight loans from CEPRODEL and they have been used to improve his house.  The loan he is currently requesting will be used to buy sheets of corrugated metal and wood for the roof of his house.

loans.use: House improvements.  Replacing his roof

loans.name: Maria Nela

texts.es:
La señora Maria Nela M. V. es comerciante es propietaria de un puesto donde vende Agroquimicos e Insectisidas , tiene de trabajar con creditos en CEPRODEL desde el año 2006 lleva 49 creditos los cuales los ha pagado en tiempo y forma, solicita credito par air incrementando.

Doña Maria Nela M. es casada, tiene 3 hijos todos dependen de ella pues estan en adades escolares , su esposo trabaja en el mismo negocio que ella ambos luchan a diario para sustento de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mrs Maria Nela M. V. is a merchant.  She owns a stall where she sells agricultural chemicals and insecticides.  She has been receiving loans from CEPRODEL since 2006.  She has had 49 loans which have all been paid on time and in full.  She is requesting this loan to continue increasing her business.

Maria Nela M. is married and has 3 children who are all dependent on her since they are all  school age.  Her husband works in the same business as she does.  They both struggle every day to support their children.

loans.use: To buy products

loans.name: Juan Boanerges

texts.es: El Sr. Juan Boanerges Gutiérrez García es trabajador Activo de la empresa D.G.I desempeñándose como Guarda de Seguridad tiene tres  años de trabajar para esta institución. Ha tenido  dos   créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Juan Boanerges Gutiérrez García is an employee of the firm D.G.I.  He has been working there as a security guard for 3 years.  He has taken 2 loans with CEPRODEL, and with each one he has been able to buy construction materials to expand and improve his house.  He has benefited greatly from these loans, because they have allowed him to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: personal expenses

loans.name: G.s Ovejitas De Jesus Group

texts.es: Paula Romelia y Fidelina conforman el grupo solidario Ovejitas De Jesús. Ellas son personas muy responsables se dedican a la misma actividades económicas. Paubla tiene más de 16 años de tener este negocio, por lo que ha sido muy difícil ya que ha tenido mucha competencia pero ella ha sabido muy bien tratar a sus clientes, pues es muy importante para mantener a su familia. En el caso de Fidelina tiene una pulpería, desde hace mas de 14 años siempre le ha gustado obtener este medio de vida que para ella es muy importante. Juntas han decidido realizar este financiamiento con el fin de invertir en sus negocios.
texts.en: Paula Romelia and Fidelina belong to the communal bank "Ovejitas De Jesús."  They are very responsible people who are both in the same line of work.   Paula has had her business for more than 16 years.  It has been very difficult, since there has been a lot of competition, but she knows how to treat her customers.  Her business is very important in supporting her family.  In the case of Fidelina, she has had a grocery store for more than 14 years.  She has always enjoyed earning a living this way; for her the business is very important.  Together, they have decided to take out this loan with the objective of investing in their businesses.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Este cliente es padre de familia de tres hijos y estos se encuentran en el colegio, el prestamo solicitado es para la compra de materiales de construccion como: zinc, madera, clavos para el techo de su  casa de habitacion.
texts.en:
This client is a father of three children who are in high school.  

He is asking for this loan to purchase construction materials like zinc, wood, and nails for the roof of his house.

loans.use: to repair the roof of his home

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Home improvement

loans.name: Maritza Maribel

texts.es:
La señora Maritza  Maribel L. A. es trabajadora de la Alcaldia de Chinandega se desempeña como operaria de Limpieza tiene 8 años de laborar y lleva ya 05 credito con CEPRODEL desde el año 2006.
Doña Maribel es casada con 03 hijos todos en edades escolares , su esposo tambien trabaja habitan en el Barrio la Normal  han demostrado ser personas muy responsable.
texts.en:
Maritza  Maribel L. A. has worked in the mayor's office in Chinandega as a cleaner for eight years.  She has had five loans from CEPRODEL since 2006.

Maribel is married and has three school aged children.  Her husband also works.  They live in Barrio la Normal.  They have shown that they are very responsible people.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials

loans.name: Asdrúbal Francisco

texts.es: El Sr. Asdrúbal Francisco C. C. es trabajador Activo de la Empresa “Emprosa” desempeñándose como operador de vigilante tiene un  año de trabajar para esta Empresa, es casado actualmente. Ha tenido  dos   créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Asdrúbal Francisco C. C. has worked at Emprosa as a security officer for a year.  He is married.

He has had two loans from CEPRODEL, which he has used to purchase construction materials to expand and improve his home.  His loans have benefited him very much because he has been able to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: Purchase sand, cement, stones, stone blocks, flooring, and doors

loans.name: Sayda Carol

texts.es: La Sra. Sayda Carol S. S. es trabajadora Activa del colegio público “Los Espinoza” desempeñándose como Maestra de Educación Primaria tiene catorce  años de trabajar para esta institución, es casada actualmente tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos   créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Sayda Carol S. S. works at the Los Espinoza public school as a primary school teacher.  She has worked there for fourteen years.  She is married and has two school aged children.

She has had two loans from CEPRODEL, which she has used to purchase construction materials to expand and improve her home.  The loans have benefited her very much because she has been able to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: Purchase sand, cement, stones, stone blocks, flooring, and doors

loans.name: Eduardo Jose

texts.es: EDUARDO JOSE A. B.,Trabaja como Vigilante en la Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería.                                                                                                        es padre de familia de dos hijos y estos se encuentran en edad escolar,el prestamo solicitado es para la compra de materiales de construccion como:ladrillo, cemento para su casa de habitacion.
texts.en: Eduardo Jose A. B. works as a security guard at the Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería (National University of Engineering). He's the father of two young children. This loan is for the purchase of construction materials such as bricks and cement for his house.

loans.use: Purchase of bricks and cement to repair a wall in his house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of construction materials such as sand, cement, gravel, etc.

loans.name: Amalia

texts.es: La señora Amalia es cliente antigua la actividad a la que se dedica es la venta D. comida la cual es realizada en la puerta D. su domicilio los días viernes, sábado y domingo, pero su actividad principal es la confección D. polleras la que realiza en su domicilio. La señora vive en anticrético en la calle entre ríos, vive con su esposo el que se dedica al trabajo en imprenta y con su hijo quien estudia en un instituto. El crédito será destinado en la compra D. tela por esta temporada tiene contratos para confeccionar polleras para lo cual debe D. comprar cortes D. tela y también en la compra D. abarrotes (arroz, fideo, papa y chuño) por mayor. Es una persona muy amable y muy trabajadora.
texts.en: Amalia is an old customer and she sells food from her home on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays, but her main activity is making skirts in her home. She lives in anticrético (a special tenant-friendly renting arrangement in Bolivia) on the street between rivers. She lives with her husband, who works at a printing press and with her son, who's in high school. The loan will be for the purchase of cloth for this season. She has contracts to make skirts for which she should buy swaths of fabric. She also needs to buy groceries (rice, noodles, potatoes, and potato flour) wholesale. She's a very nice and hardworking person.

loans.use: Purchase of fabric to make skirts and purchase of groceries

loans.name: Moisés

texts.es:
El  señor Moisés C. se dedica al servicio de Molino lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación que está situada en el Municipio del Viejo.
Es soltero  tiene 3 personas bajo su  cargo, lleva ya 10 años trabajando con CEPRODEL obteniendo créditos periódicamente  y ha obtenido 12 créditos los cuales los ha pagado en tiempo y forma es muy responsable.
texts.en:
Mr Moisés C. provides milling services from his house which is located in El Viejo district.

He is single and has 3 people in his care.  He has been working with CEPRODEL for 10 years, periodically obtaining loans.  He has had 12 loans which he has always paid back on time.  He is very responsible.

loans.use: To buy spare parts to maintain his mill

loans.name: Pablo Alfonso

texts.es:
El señor  Pablo Alfonso C. E. es trabajador de una imprenta desde hace 3 años ha obtenido 5 creditos con CEPRODEL, ha sido muy cumplido con sus pagos.

Don Pablo C. solicito credito para alistar a su hijo que esta por culminar sus studios de primaria y necesita pagar colegiaturas, y preparle uniformes para su promocion.
texts.en:
Mr Pablo Alfonso C. E. has been working in a printing business for 3 years.   He has had 5 loans from CEPRODEL and has always made his repayments on time.

Pablo C. is requesting a loan to get his son ready.  His son is about to finish his elementary school education and he needs to pay his tuition fees and get him a uniform for his graduation.

loans.use: Personal expenses

loans.name: Lucia Leonor

texts.es: La Sra. Lucia Leonor L. M. es trabajadora Activa del Centro de Salud Francisco Morazán de Nicaragua desempeñándose como Oficial de Tramites tiene nueve  años de trabajar para esta institución es casado actualmente tiene un niño en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Lucia Leonor L. M. works as a Process Officer at Nicaragua’s Francisco Morazán Health Center.  She has been working here for nine years.  She is married and has a school aged child.

She has had two loans with CEPRODEL which have been used to buy building materials and supplies for home improvements.  Ceprodel loans have been of great use to her because she’s improved her and her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: Will buy building materials and supplies: sand, cement, stone, gravel, etc.

loans.name: Juana Isidra

texts.es:
La señora Juana Isidra G. B. es comerciante se dedica a la venta de verduras y frutas en un tramo en la esquina del Mercado frente al Mundo Elegante, vende tomates, cebolla, chiltomas, zanahorias, churros, cajeta de leche y frutas peladas empacadas en bolsitas.
Doña Juana G.  es una señora de unos 70 años es acompañada tiene 6 hijos en total pero ninguno depende de ella todos son independientes y casados, lleva ya trabajando con CEPRODEL desde el año 2004 y ha obtenido 41 creditos.
texts.en:
Juana Isidra G. B. is a merchant who sells fruits and vegetables from a stand at the corner of the market in front of the Mundo Elegante store.  She sells tomatoes, onions, chiltomas (small peppers), carrots, churros, milk caramel and peeled fruit packed in bags.  

Juana G. is a 70 year-old woman who has a partner and 6 children.  None of her children are are dependent; they are all married and live independently.  She has been working with CEPRODEL since 2004, and over that time she has taken 41 loans.

loans.use: to buy products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies to erect a wall.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
El señor luis Alberto C. S., es trabajador de la Alcaldia de Chinandega con quien tenemos un Convenio con cuotas deducibles cada 15 y 30 de cada mes, el señor lleva ya 3 años trabajando con CEPRODEL y obtenido  6 creditos los cuales le han ayudado a mejorar sus condiciones de vida.

El señor luis Alberto C. habita en el Rpto Carlos Manzanares carretera al Viejo, es casado con 2 hijos en edades escolares, su esposa es maestra de secundaria y labora para el Instituto de Chinandega.
texts.en:
Mr. Luís Alberto C. Sánchez is employed by the City of Chinandega with which we have a Salary Deduction Agreement applicable every 15th and 30th day of the month.  He has been collaborating with CEPRODEL for three years and has had 6 loans that have helped him improve his living conditions.

Mr. Luís Alberto C. Sánchez lives in Reparto Carlos Manzanares along the highway to El Viejo.  He’s married and has two school aged children.  His wife is a secondary school teacher employed at Chinandega Institute.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Santos Paula

texts.es:
La Señora Santos Paula M. R., inicia a elaborar su tortilla desde las 2:00 am. Hasta las 9:00 am. Posteriormente se traslada su Hija al mercado Santos Bárcenas para realizar su venta.

 Este crédito fue utilizado para compra de productos para elaboración de tortillas tales como: maíz, leña, cal. 

La Señora M.  R., con los créditos que le ha brindado CEPRODEL  se siente muy conforme por que ha logrado a incrementar su negocio y así ha  realizado la construcción de su casa a pesar que ella es madre soltera.
texts.en:
Mrs Santos Paula M. R. starts making her tortillas at 2.00am.  She finishes at 9.00am then takes her daughter to Santos Bárcenas market to sell them.

This loan will be used to buy products for making tortillas such as corn, firewood and lime.

Mrs M. R., through the loans which CEPRODEL has offered her, feels very happy that she has managed to increase her business and thereby build her house in spite of being a single mother.

loans.use: Purchase of corn, firewood and lime

loans.name: Cristian De Jesús

texts.es: El Sr. Cristian de Jesús T. T. es trabajador Activo del Hotel Barceló Monte limar   desempeñándose como Turnero en el área de mantenimiento tiene siete  años de trabajar para esta institución es casado actualmente tiene tres niños en edad escolar. Ha tenido  cuatro  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Cristian de Jesús T. T. is a shift employee in the maintenance department at Barceló Montelimar Hotel.  He has worked for this company for 7 years.  He’s married and has three school age children.

He has had four CEPRODEL loans that have been used to buy building materials and supplies to enlarge and improve his home.
Ceprodel loans have been of great benefit to him in that they have made it possible for him to improve his and his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies: Sand, Cement, Paving Stones, Gavel, etc.

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es:
CARLOS ANTONIO A. G.,Trabaja como Bodeguero en el Centro de Capacitación Profesional Nicaragüense Alemán.  es padre de familia de dos hijos y estos se encuentran en edad escolar, ha trabajado dos prestamo con ceprodel y estos han sido para el mejoramiento de su vivienda.
el prestamo solicitado es para la compra de materiales de construccion para su cas de habitacion.
texts.en: Carlos Antonio A. G. works in the warehouse of the Nicaragüense Alemán Center for Professional Training.  He is the father of 2 school-aged children.  He has taken 2 loans previously with CEPRODEL, and these have been used to make improvements to his house.  The loan requested will be used to purchase construction materials for his house.

loans.use: he is going to use the loan to purchase construction materials to repair a bedroom in his house

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Magaly Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Magaly del Socorro V. es trabajadora de la Alcaldia de Chinandega con quien firmamos convenio con deducciones de salario quincenales, se desempeña como operadora de limpieza publica desde hace 05 años, es casada con 03 hijos en edades escolares y ahorita solicito credito para alistar a sus  hijos para promocion de 6to. Grado y pre-escolar.

Doña Magaly V. habita en le barrio San Agustin y lleva ya 06 creditos con CEPRODEL  con los cuales ha logrado mejorar su vivienda entre otras cosas.
texts.en:
Mrs. Magaly del Socorro V. is employed by the City of Chinandega with which we have signed a Salary Deduction Agreement applicable every two weeks.  She has worked as a Sanitary Worker for five years.  She’s married and has three school age children.  She is asking for funds to get the children ready for 6th grade and Pre-School graduation.

Mrs. Magaly V. lives in the San Agustín neighborhood and has had 6 CEPRODEL loans which she has used for home improvements among other things.

loans.use: For personal expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of materials for sowing: fertilizers, agricultural inputs, etc.

loans.name: Presentacion Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Presentacion del Carmen N. se dedica al comercio es propietaria de un tramo en  el  sector de ropa el Bisne, es soltera no tiene hijos a cargo y habita en la mora, lleva ya 6 años trabajando con CEPRODEL y ha obtenido 39 creditos los cuales los ha pagado en tiempo y forma es muy responsable.
La señora Presentacion N. vende ropa de todo estilo y a diferentes precios.
texts.en:
Mrs Presentacion del Carmen N. is the owner of a spot in the clothes section of El Bisne market.  She is single, doesn't have any children in her care and lives in La Mora. She has been working with CEPRODEL for 6 years.  She has had 39 loans all of which she has paid on time and in full.  She is very responsible.

Mrs Presentacion N. sells all types of clothes in a range of prices.

loans.use: To buy clothes to increase her stock

loans.name: Bettycarolina

texts.es: BETTYCAROLINA M. C.,Trabaja como Secretaria Ejecutiva en el Centro de Capacitación Profesional Nicaragüense Alemán . el prestamo solicitado es para la compra  de materiales electricos para su casa de habitacion, es madre de familia de un niño y ete se encuentra en edad escolar.
texts.en: Betty Carolina M. C. works as an executive secretary at the 'Centro de Capacitación Profesional Nicaragüense Alemán' (Nicaraguan Professional Training Center).  The loan will be used for buying electrical materials for her home.  She is mother to one school-age child.

loans.use: To buy electrical materials for her home and to settle some family expenses

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es: El Sr. Francisco Javier S. C. es trabajador Activo de la Empresa CEMEX Nicaragua desempeñándose como Utility tiene dos años de trabajar para esta institución es casado actualmente tiene dos niños en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Francisco Javier S. C. works for CEMEX Nicaragua as a utility worker.  He has been working for them for two years.  He is married and has two school-age children.  He has had two loans from CEPRODEL and each one has been used to buy building material to extend and improve his house.  CEPRODEL's loans have greatly benefited him since they have enabled him to improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: To buy building materials: sand, cement, stone, etc.

loans.name: Mirtalia De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Mirtalia Muñoz O. es una persona emprendedora, quien tiene su negocio de venta de ropa en el Mercado Israel lewite, tiene mas de 20 años de estar en el Mercado y de tener esta actividad. Ella es madre soltera.
Ella trabaja de lunes a domingos de 6 de la mañana hasta las cinco de la tardes.
El préstamo solicitado es para la compra de ropa interior, pantalones, blusas y trajes para niños ya que en estos meses las ventas son buenas.
Ha trabajado 21 préstamos con la institución y estos han sido para compra de mercadería para su negocio.
texts.en:
Mirtalia  Muñoz O. is an enterprising person who owns a business selling clothes in the Israel Lewite market.  She has been working in this business in the market for more than 20 years.  She is a single mother.  She works from Monday to Sunday from 6 in the morning until 5 in the evening.  The loan which she is requesting will be used to buy underwear, pants, blouses and outfits for children since sales are good right now.

She has had 21 loans from the organization and they have all been used to buy merchandise for her business.

loans.use: To buy underwear, pants, blouses, t-shirts and outfits for children

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
El Señor Juan Antonio F., inicio su negocio en el mercado la estación con venta de mercadería en general y con capital de C$3,000.00 productos de sus ahorros, actualmente su negocio es de distribuidor de gaseosas,  jugos y aguas purificada y se encuentra establecido costado sur de la terminal de buses, iniciando sus labores desde las 6 am. Y finalizando hasta 6 pm. 

El señor F. se siente muy agradecido con CEPRODEL porque  con los préstamos que le ha otorgado ha logrado a incrementar su inventario
texts.en:
Juan Antonio F. began his business at the La Estación market selling general merchandise and with 3,000 Nicaraguan Cordobas (NIO) of his savings. His current business is distributing sodas, juices and purified water and he works from 6am to 6pm at the southern side of the bus terminal.

Mr. F. feels grateful for CEPRODEL because he has been able to increase his inventory with the loans that they have provided to him.

loans.use: To buy sodas, juices, and purified water

loans.name: Scarlet Martha

texts.es:
Scarlet E. C. es madre soltera de dos niños y estos se encuentran en edad escolar.
Ha trabajado 2 préstamos con la institución y estos han sido para el mejoramiento de su casa de habitación.
El préstamo solicitado es para la compra de materiales de construcción como: PIEDRA, ARENA Y HIERRO PARA LA CONSTRUCCION DE UN BAÑO PARA SU casa de habitación.
Scarlet dice que gracias a los préstamos otorgados por ceprodel ha venido mejorando su casa de habitación.
texts.en:
Scarlet E. C. is a single mother of two school-aged children. She has taken out two loans through CEPRODEL which have been to make improvements to her house.

The loan requested is for the purchase of construction materials such as stone, sand and iron sheets to build a bathroom for her house. Scarlet says that thanks to the loans granted by CEPRODEL, she has been able to make improvements to her house.

loans.use: To buy stone, sand and iron sheets to build a bathroom for her house.

loans.name: Lorena Valentina

texts.es: La señora Lorena Valentina tiene 54 años, es casada. La señora se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Ella  tiene 9 años de tener este negocio, dio inicio con pocas cosas como pantalones, camisas, faldas. Con el tiempo fue invirtiéndole y este ha ido creciendo poco a poco hasta llegar a tener una mercadería muy surtida. Ella solicita este crédito con el propósito de realizar una inversión considerable a su negocio por lo que se acercan unos buenos meses como noviembre y diciembre, en que se espera las ventas de todos los productos se incrementen. Su sueño es seguir incrementando y haciendo crecer su negocio, y si es posible llegar a mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Lorena Valentina is 54 years old, married, and works selling general merchandise. She has had this business for nine years and started with only a few things such as pants, shirts and skirts. Over time, she has been investing in it and it has been growing little by little to become a well-varied inventory.

She is requesting this loan for the purpose of making a considerable investment in her business because November and December are approaching and she hopes that her product sales will increase. Her dream is to continue expanding and having her business grow and if it is possible, she wants to be able to make housing improvements.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.es:
La Señora Zenaida M. M.,  inicia con pequeña cantidad ambulante, con un capital de C$ 5,000.00 producto de ahorros y aporte de su esposo. La señora M. viaja muy temprano de la casa de habitación ubicada en la comarca de Larreynaga hacia el mercado la terminal para proceder a la venta de su producto cuyas labores finaliza a las 12 pm.
Este crédito fue utilizado para  compra de productos como Zinc y Golosos para la mejora de vivienda.
La señora M. se siente muy satisfecha y agradecía con los créditos que CEPRODEL le ha podido brindar ya que ha mejorado su calidad de vida e iniciar el mejoramiento de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Zenaida M. M. began with a small amount of traveling with $5,000 Nicaraguan cordobas that she saved and support from her husband.  She travels very early from her home, located in the Larreynaga region, to the market to sell their products, which closes at 12pm.  

She will use this loan to purchase products like zinc sheeting and screws to improve her home.  

She feels very satisfied and thankful for her loans from CEPRODEL, which have allowed her to improve her quality of life and begin improving her home.

loans.use: Purchase zinc sheeting and screws

loans.name: Juan Rodrigo

texts.es: El Sr. Juan Rodrigo P. G. es trabajador Activo para el Hotel Barceló Monte limar desempeñándose como D.J y animador  tiene un año de trabajar para esta institución, es acompañado actualmente tiene un niño en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada  uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Juan Rodrigo P. G. works for the Hotel Barcelo Monte as a DJ and host. He has worked there for one year. He has a partner, and a school-aged son. He has received two loans from CEPRODEL and each of them has been used to purchase construction materials to expand and improve his home. He has benefited greatly from these loans, as he has been able to improve his living conditions and those of his family.

loans.use: purchase building materials: sand, cement, stones, blocks, etc.

loans.name: Sebastiana Cristina

texts.es:
Sebastiana R. García es una persona emprendedora quien tiene su negocio en su casa de habitación de venta de nacatamales y fritanga, ella trabaja junto con su mama en la elaboración de los nacatamales y las fritanga que hace los fines de semana. Ella es una persona sencilla y con buenos principios morales.
Es madre de familia de  tres hijos y solo uno dependen de ella y este se encuentra en el colegio.
El préstamo lo quiere para la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de los nacatamales y la fritanga para su negocio.
Sebastiana R. ha trabajado 7 préstamos con la institución y estos han sido para la compra de mercadería para su negocio.
texts.en:
Sebastiana R. García is an enterprising woman.  She has a business in her house selling “nacatamales” (steamed meat and vegetable pastry, cooked in banana or maize leaves) and fried food.  She works with her mother making the nacatamales and fried food on the week-ends.  She is an unassuming woman with good moral principles.  She has three children, but only one is dependent upon her.  This child goes to high school.

She wants the loan to buy ingredients for making the nacatamales and fried foods for her business.  Sebastiana R. has worked with the institution on seven loans.  These loans have been to buy goods for her business.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make nacatamales and fried food.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es:
El Sr. Francisco C. M. es una persona emprendedora quien tiene su negocio en el mercado Israel Lewite de Managua de reparación de calzado, el trabaja de lunes a domingos de las 7 de la mañana hasta las cinco de la tarde, el es padre de familia de dos niños los que a su vez se encuentran en el colegio.
El préstamo solicitado es para la compra de mercadería para su negocio como: suela para zapatos, pega, hilo y chapa para el zapato de damas.
texts.en:
Francisco C. M. is an enterprising person who has a shoe repair business in the Israel Lewite market in Managua.  He works from seven in the morning until five in the afternoon on Mondays through Sundays.  He has two children who go to school.

The requested loan is to buy merchandise for his business.  He will buy things like soles, glue, thread, and metal taps for women’s shoes.

loans.use: To buy soles for shoes, glue, thread, and metal taps for shoes

loans.name: José Alexis

texts.es: El Sr. José Alexis Z. M. él es productor dedicado a diversas actividades  agrícolas los rubros que siembra principalmente es el maíz, frijol, trigo  tiene veinte años de dedicarse a esta actividad. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo ha hecho para preparar el terreno  y comprar los materiales  para la siembra,   los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera él ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
José Alexis Z. M. is a farmer.  He mainly grows corn, beans, and wheat.  He has been doing this for 20 years.  

He has had two loans with CEPRODEL.  He used each loan to prepare the land and buy materials for planting.  The CEPRODEL loans have been greatly beneficial to him because that is the way he has improved his living conditions and those of his family.

loans.use: To buy supplies like urea and fertilizer for planting

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
La señora Juana Francisca L., es soltera madre de 2 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, es trabajadora de la alcaldía de Chinandega se desempeña en el área de conserje, empresa con la que tenemos convenio de prestarles siempre y cuando este sea sujeto de crédito con sus respectivos requisitos y que el pago de este financiamiento sea deducido de planilla el día de pago que son quincenales.
La señora L. estaba solicitando este financiamiento para terminar de pagar los colegios de sus niños y pagos de medicamentos lleva cinco créditos con nuestra institución tiene de trabajar con nosotros desde el año 2007. Y con estos ha venido mejorando su casa como su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mrs Juana Francisca L. is a single mother who has two school-age children.  She works for the City of Chinandega as a caretaker.  This is a company with whom we have an agreement whereby we inform them when an employee takes a loan and the repayments on the loan are deducted from the employee's wages on pay day which is every two weeks.

Mrs L. is requesting this loan so that she can finish paying her children's school fees and also pay for medicines.  She has had five loans with our organization and has been with us since 2007.  Her loans have been used to improve her house and her standard of living.

loans.use: To cover personal expenses such as school fees and medicines

loans.name: Marisol De Los Ángeles

texts.es: La joven Marisol de los ángeles A. E., es trabajadora de la alcaldía de Chinandega  desde hace 3 años se desempeña en el cargo de secretaria, es primera vez que saca financiamientos en la institución y los está solicitando para gastos personales para pago de sus estudios
texts.en:
Marisol de los Ángeles A. E. has been employed as a Secretary by the City of Chinandega for the last three years.

This is her first loan request from the institution.  She will use the funds to pay personal educational expenses.

loans.use: For Personal Educational Expenses.

loans.name: Martha Leticia

texts.es: La Sra. Martha Leticia A. A. es trabajadora Activa de la Escuela Técnica de Computación y Contabilidad de San Rafael del Sur desempeñándose en el cargo de Atención al Cliente tiene tres años de trabajar para esta institución. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha  realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Martha Leticia A. A. has been employed in Customer Service by the San Rafael del Sur Technical School of Accounting and Computation for the last three years.

She has had two previous CEPRODEL loans that she used to buy building materials and supplies to enlarge and improve her home.  

Ceprodel loans have been of great benefit in that they have made it possible for her to improve her and her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies: Sand, Cement, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies for roof repair.

loans.name: Santiago Antonio

texts.es: El señor Santiago Antonio E.  tiene un negocio en su casa de habitación en el que vende frijoles cocidos es un señor luchador soltero tiene a cargo tres nietos por los que lucha fuertemente para sacarlos adelante, tiene seis años de trabajar con nosotros y se siente muy agradecido por los financiamientos que le hemos brindado ya que con estos ha salido adelante y le ha dado estudios a sus nietos solicitaba el financiamiento para invertir en comprar frijoles aunque sea medio quintal ya que el frijol está bien caro
texts.en:
Mr. Santiago Antonio E. has a business installed in his home where he sells cooked beans.  He is a hard working single man who has three grandchildren in his care.  He struggles mightily to support them. 

He has collaborated with us for the last six years and he is very thankful for the loans he has gotten because they have made it possible for him to get ahead and provide education for his grandchildren.

He is asking for funds to buy beans, even if just half a quintal, because beans are very expensive.

loans.use: To buy quintales (A unit of mass in the metric system equal to 100 kilograms) of beans.

loans.name: Mercedes Del Socorro

texts.es: La  señora Mercedes Z. se dedica al comercio, es propietaria de un tramo en el sector verduras del Mercado central, es casada su esposo tiene una mini ferretería en las afueras del mercado y no tiene hijos bajo su cargo y habita en el Repto 12 de Septiembre.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mercedes Z. is a merchant.  She has a space in the vegetables section of the Central Market. 

She is married and her husband has a mini hardware store outside the market.

She does not have any children in her care and she lives in Reparto 12 de Septiembre.

loans.use: To buy ingredients, basic grains, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es:
El señor José Luis C. L., es trabajador activo de Lidya Ludic de Nicaragua desde hace seis  devengando un salario de C$6,000.00 desempeñando el cargo de cajero, el señor C. está muy agradecido con Ceprodel por que ha logrado a mejorar su vivienda. 

Este crédito lo utilizo para compra de Cerámica, cemento, arena, y pago de mano de obra para terminar la construcción de un Pantry
texts.en:
Mr. José Luis C. L. has been employed as a Cashier at Lidya Ludic de Nicaragua earning a salary of C$6,000.00.  He is very grateful to Ceprodel because he has managed to improve his home.

He used the loan to buy tile, cement and sand and to pay labor costs to finish building a pantry.

loans.use: To buy tile, cement, sand and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Maria Irene

texts.es:
La señora Maria Irene V. es trabajadora de la Alcaldia De Chinandega con quien tenemos un convenio con cuotas deducibles de salario quincenalmente, lleva ya 06 años de trabajar con CEPRODEL y ha obtenido 07 creditos los que ha utilizado para brindar major condiciones de vida a su familia y sufragar algunos gastos imprevistos.

Doña Maria Irene habita en el Barrio San Agustin es madre soltera de dos hijos en edades escolares, ha sido muy cumplida con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Mrs. María Irene V. is employed by the City of Chinandega with which we have signed a Salary Deduction Agreement applicable every two weeks.  

She has collaborated with Ceprodel for 6 years and has obtained 7 loans that she’s used provide improved living conditions for her family and to pay for a few unforeseen expenses.

María Irene lives in the San Agustín neighborhood.  She’s a single mother of two school age children.  She has made her repayments on time

loans.use: For Personal Expenses.

loans.name: José María

texts.es:
El Sr. A. A., es trabajador activo del colegio Cristo Salvador desde hace cinco años  desempeñando el cargo de docente devengando un salario mensual de C$3,900.00. 

Este Sr. está  muy agradecido con Ceprodel por que ha logrado a comprar sus electrodoméstic
texts.en:
Mr. A. A. has been employed as a Teacher at Cristo Salvador School for five years.  He earns a monthly salary of C$3,900.00.

He is very grateful with Ceprodel because he was able to buy his home appliances.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Claudia Gisel

texts.es:
La Sra. Claudia Gisel T. se dedica a hacer fritanga por las tardes en su casa de habitación, es una señora con una amplia experiencia en la fritanga además de trabajar en la Alcaldía de Chinandega por las mañanas ya que es operaria de limpieza.

Esta señora ha tenido un buen record con la institución ya que tiene créditos con CEPRODEL desde el año 2005 y ha sido una excelentísima cliente.
texts.en:
Mrs. Claudia Gisel T. makes fast food in the afternoons at home.  She has a lot of experience making fast food and also works for the City of Chinandega during the morning as Cleaning lady.

She has had a very good record with the institution in that she has had three loans with CEPRODEL since 2005 and she’s been an extremely excellent client.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make Tajadas (typical Nicaraguan fast food): bananas, cooking oil, manioc, cabbage, etc.

loans.name: Roger Antonio

texts.es:
Roger Antonio Pavón S., trabaja para el centro Nehemías como supervisor de proyecto.
El es padre de familia de dos hijos y estos se encuentran en el colegio.
El préstamo solicitado es para la compra de materiales de construcción como: zinc, madera, clavos y mano de obra para el techo de su casa.
Roger dice que gracias a los préstamos otorgados por ceprodel ha podido mejorar su casa de habitación, por lo que ahora su familia cuenta con mejores condiciones en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Roger Antonio Pavón S. works as a Project Supervisor at the Nehemías Center.

He is a father of two children who are in school.

The requested loan is to buy building materials and supplies, like: zinc metal sheeting, lumber, nails and to pay labor costs to repair his roof.

Roger states that thanks to Ceprodel loans he has been able to improve his home so that now his family has better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Darling Celeste

texts.es:
La Sra. Darling Celeste S. G. es comerciante del Mercado central, ella vende pepena, frito, carne de cerdo, hueso, etc. 
Esta señora tiene 15 años de experiencia en este negocio y es un excelentísimo clienta, muy responsable con sus obligaciones.
A la fecha lleva 31 créditos con CEPRODEL,  y siempre ha cumplido, esta señora dice sentirse muy agradecida con la Institución por todo el apoyo que le han brindado.
texts.en:
Mrs. Darling Celeste S. G. is a merchant in the Central Market.  She sells offal, fried pork skins, pork, bones, etc.

She has 15 years experience in this business and she is a most excellent client; she is very responsible with her commitments.

To date she has had 31 CEPRODEL loans and has always repaid.  She says that she is very grateful with the Institution for all the support it’s given her.

loans.use: To buy live pigs for butchering.

loans.name: Luis Gonzalo

texts.es:
Luis López R. es una persona emprendedora quien tiene su negocio en el mercado Israel lewite de Managua de venta de frutas y verduras, tiene mas de 20 años de estar en el mercado, es una persona sencilla y de buenos principios morales.
Es padre de familia de  cuatro hijos y solo dos dependen de el y estos se encuentran en el colegio.
El préstamo lo quiere para la compra de frutas y verduras para incrementar su negocio.
Luis ha trabajado 12 préstamos con la institución y estos han sido para la compra de mercadería para su negocio.
El trabaja de lunes a sábado de las 5 de la mañana hasta las cuatro de la tarde.
texts.en:
Luis López R. is an enterprising person who has a business selling fruit and vegetables in the Israel Lewite market in Managua.  He has been in the market for over 20 years.  He is an unassuming person with good moral values.  He has four children.  Two of the children are dependent upon him, and they go to school.

He wants the loan to buy fruits and vegetables to increase his business.  Luis has had 12 loans with the institution.  The loans have been to buy merchandise for his business.

He works from five in the morning until four in the afternoon Monday through Saturday.

loans.use: To buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es: La Sra. María Elena S. A. es comerciante se dedica a vender ropa interior de damas y caballeros, realiza las compras en el mercado oriental de Managua y distribuye en el Mercado Mayoreo  de Chinandega, sus clientes le abonan semanalmente y trabaja con la institución desde hace 5 años,  ya lleva 31 clientes con Ceprodel y ella ha sido una excelente clienta muy responsable en sus pagos es soltera tiene hijos pero ninguno depende de ella habita en la Col. Julio Cesar tinoco, Chinandega.
texts.en:
María Elena S. A. sells women’s and men’s underwear.  She makes her purchases in the Eastern Market of Managua.   She distributes her products in the Mercado Mayoreo of Chinandega.  Her customers pay her weekly.  

She has worked with the institution for five years.  She has had 31 loans with Ceprodel, and she has been an excellent client.  She has been very responsible with her payments.

She is single.  She has children, but none of them are dependent upon her.  She lives in the Colonia Julio Cesar Tinoco, Chinandega.

loans.use: Buy firewood, bags for soft drinks, and ice, etc.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es:
La Sra.  María  del Carmen  R. M.  trabaja para la  el Colegio San Ramón desde hace 24 años  teniendo el puesto de Recepcionista su labor inicia desde la 7:00 Am hasta  1:30 Pm es la encargada de atender a los padres de familias y Documentación que le envían al Director del Centro.  

 Este crédito fue utilizado para  gastos Medico
texts.en:
María del Carmen R. M. has been working for the Colegio San Ramón (Saint Ramon School) for 24 years as the receptionist. She works from 7 am to 1:30 pm. Her role is to work with the parents of families and process the paperwork that they send to the center director.

This loan was used for medical expenses.

loans.use: Consumption / Medical expenses

loans.name: Reynaldo Francisco

texts.es: El señor Reynaldo G. es trabajador de ALCALDIA DE MANAGUA labora como responsable de servicios generales es casado tiene dos personas a su cargo solicita crédito para mejoras de vivienda, compra de hierro, piedrín, cemento. Agradece a CEPRODEL por su apoyo incondicional y apoyo para realizar su obra.
texts.en: Reynaldo G. is an employee of Alcaldia de Managua (Managua City Hall). He is responsible for general services. He is married and has two people in his care. He is requesting this loan for housing improvements, purchasing iron, gravel, and cement. He is grateful to Kiva partner Ceprodel for its unconditional support and help for carrying out his project.

loans.use: Housing improvements

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Home improvements

loans.name: Josué De Jesús

texts.es:
El Joven Josué de Jesús C. L. es trabajador de la Alcaldía de Chinandega desempeñándose como Operador grafico tiene 7 años de trabajar  en la Alcaldía y adquirió crédito a través de un convenio que hay con la Alcaldía  y Ceprodel.
Este es el crédito No. 5 que lleva con la Institución lo cual  todos los anteriores los ha pagado muy bien en tiempo y forma
Este crédito lo va a utilizar para pagar gastos de la Universidad y medicamentos ya que su mama se encuentra un poco enferma, el vive con su esposa y su mamá ya que hijos no tiene hasta los momentos.
texts.en:
Josue de Jesus Cabreras L. works at the Mayor's office in Chinandega as a graphic designer. He has worked at the Mayor's office for the past 7 years and qualified for his loan through a joint program between the Mayor's office and Ceprodel. This is his 5th loan with the institution and all his previous loans were paid on time. 

He plans to use this loan on college expenses and some medications that his ill mother needs. He lives with his wife and his mother and doesn't have children as of yet.

loans.use: University and medical expenses

loans.name: Amanda Cecilia

texts.es:
La Sra.   R. trabaja como Operaria de la Empresa Arnecom de Nicaragua  su días de trabajo son variado ya que cada 15 días realiza  turnos de mañana y 15 días  por la tarde por la mañana su jornada es de 6:00 am a 2:00 Pm y en la tarde de 3:00 Pm a 10:00 Pm.
  
 Este crédito fue utilizado para la compra de  cemento, arena y ladrillos.
texts.en:
Ms. R. works as an operator for the company Arnecom of Nicaragua.  Her work schedule varies because every 15 days she works morning shifts, and then 15 days of afternoon shifts.  In the morning, her shift is 6:00 am to 2:00 pm, and in the afternoons, she works from 3:00 pm to 10:00 pm.

She will use this loan to buy cement, sand, and bricks.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and bricks

loans.name: María Lourdes

texts.es:
La joven María Lourdes R. P. es una comerciante que se dedica a vender churros, donas, pasteles, etc. Ella realiza las compras en el mercado mayoreo Bisne y realiza las ventas en las acercas de su casa y su comunidad. 
Ella vende diario sus productos y trabaja con Ceprodel desde hace 3 años y lleva 20 créditos, es una excelentísima clienta muy responsable con todos sus pagos es acompañada y tiene 3 niños.
Ella habita en el Rpto. La florida.
texts.en:
The young María Lourdes R. P. is a merchant who sells churros, donuts, cakes, etc.  She makes her purchases in the wholesale Bisne market, and makes her sales in the area surrounding her house, and in her community.

She sells her products daily.  She has been working with CEPRODEL for 3 years and has taken 20 loans over that time.  She is an excellent client who is very responsible with all of her payments.  She has a partner and 3 children.

She lives in the La Florida housing development.

loans.use: to buy flour, cooking oil, etc.

loans.name: :   Edgar Alberto

texts.es:
EDGAR ALBERTO O. S., trabaja como Conductor en el Centro de Capacitación Profesional Nicaragüense Alemán. Cecna  . el prestamo solicitado es para la compra de materiales de construcciom como: zinc , perlines, pintura y clavos para el techo de su casa de habitacion, es padre de familia de tres hijos y estos se encuentran en edad escolar.
ha trabajado ocho prestamo son ceprodel y estos han sido para el mejoramiento de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Edgar Alberto O. S. works as a driver for the Nicaragüense Alemán Professional Training Center.  He requests a loan to buy construction materials such as: corrugated metal roofing sheets, structural beams, paint and nails for the roof of his house. He is the father of 3 school-aged children.  

He has previously taken 8 loans with CEPRODEL, and he has used these loans to make improvements to his house.

loans.use: he will use the money from the loan to buy construction materials to replace the roof of his house

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
El señor Carlos E. O. es un pescador de la zona de Jiquilillo  que tiene 15 años de experiencia, el habita en el municipio del Viejo, vive con su esposa que también es comerciante y le ayuda en los gastos del hogar tiene 3 hijos menores que están en clase.
A la fecha lleva 4 créditos con la  Institución de los cuales todos los ha cancelado bien en tiempo y forma.
texts.en:
Carlos E. O. is a fisherman in the Jiquilillo zone. He has 15 years of experience; he lives in the Viejo municipality. He lives with his wife who is also a merchant, and she helps him with the household expenses. He has three young children who are in school.

To date, he has had four loans through the Institution, all of which were paid off on time.

loans.use: Repairs and maintenance for a motorboat.

loans.name: María Delma

texts.es:
La Señora María Delma Z. es comerciante que habita en el Municipio del Viejo, se dedica a la venta de comida en el sector  el Bisne, y este crédito desea invertirlo en su negocio,  tiene 5 años de experiencia en su negocio y es una señora Responsable con todas sus obligaciones.

A la fecha lleva 24 créditos con la institución los cuales todos los ha pagado muy bien en tiempo y forma.
texts.en:
María Delma Z. is a businesswoman who lives in the Viejo Municipality. She sells food in the Bisne sector, and she wants this loan to invest in her business. She has five years of experience in this business and is a responsible woman in all of her obligations.

To date she has had 24 loans with the Institution, all of which were very well paid on time.

loans.use: Purchase oil, rice, and beans

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Este cliente es padre de familia de tres hijos dos de ellos se encuentran en el colegio, el prestamo solicitado es para la comptra de materiales de construccion para repellar su casa de habitacion. ha trabajado ocho prestamo con ceprodel y estos han sido para el mejoramiento de su casa de habirtacion.
texts.en: This client is father to three children who are in school.  The loan which he is requesting is to buy building materials to plaster his house.  He has had eight loans from CEPRODEL which have been used to improve his house.

loans.use: To improve his house and to cover some personal expenses.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Juana Dolores

texts.es:
Perfil del Cliente 	La Sra. Juana Dolores R., trabaja en el Hospital Escuela Oscar Danilo Rosales los cuales tiene 10 años de laborar para el Hospital  tiene un horario variable ya que día de por medio cambia de turno uno inicia de la 6:00 Am hasta la 1:00 Pm y el otro de 8:00 Pm a 6:00 Am 

 Este crédito fue utilizado para compra  de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro.

La Sra.  Juana R. T., está agradecida por que sus créditos con CEPRODEL le han ayudado a mejorar su calidad de vida ya que todos sus créditos han sido para mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Mrs Juana Dolores R. works in the Oscar Danilo Rosales teaching hospital.  She has worked for the hospital for 10 years and she works different shifts.  One shift is from 6.00am to 1.00pm and the other from 8.00pm to 6.00am.

Juana R. T. is grateful for the loans she has received from CEPRODEL.  They have helped her to improve her standard of living since all her loans have helped her to make improvements to her house.

loans.use: Purchase of bricks, cement, sand and iron

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Improvements to her home.  Purchase of cement, iron, sand and gravel

loans.name: Eugenio Ramón

texts.es:
Este cliente posee una enorme experiencia en el ramo de la joyería es un artesano del oro que atravez de los créditos obtenidos a sabido administras y realizar mejores inversiones en el negocio 
Es un sr. Que a convertido el negocio de la joyería en un negocio familiar ya que con su esposa e hijos están trabajando juntos para generar ingresos familiares 
Este crédito lo necesita para la compra de materiales que utiliza para la elaboración de prendas por lo que en la temporada de fin de año las graduaciones le generan trabajo con los anillos de graduación por lo que es indispensable para el este crédito.
texts.en:
This client has enormous experience in the jewelry trade.  He is a gold craftsman who has known how to manage the loans he has received and make good investments in his business.  He is a man who has turned his jewelry business into a family business since he works together with his wife and children to generate family income.

This loan is needed to buy materials which he will use to create jewelry.  It is the end-of-year graduation season.  This creates work for him as he makes graduation rings.  For this reason, the loan is essential for him.

loans.use: Purchase of raw material to make jewelry

loans.name: Diego Manuel

texts.es:
DIEGO MANUEL T. P., Trabajo como Contador en la facultad de Economía de la Universidad Nacional Autónoma de Nicaragua
es padre de familia de dos hijos y estos se encuentran en edad escolar.
el prestamo solicitado es para la compra de materiales de construccion ya que va ha cambiar el techo de su casa de habitcion.
texts.en:
Diego Manuel T. P. works as an accountant in the Economics faculty of the Universidad Nacional Autónoma de Nicaragua.

He is father to two school-age children.

The loan which he is requesting will be used to buy building materials since he needs to replace the roof of his house.

loans.use: To improve his house by replacing his roof

loans.name: Manuela Del Socorro

texts.es:
Esta clienta es madre soltera y que a salido adelante con 3 hijos que tiene a su cargo, ella es una vendedora de comida en el mercado de mayor afluencia en la ciudad. Cuenta con un puesto de comideria a orias de la calle y que a sabido admistrar atravez de los 10 años que pose de experiencia en la comideria 
Este crédito lo necesita para aprovechar la afluencia de clientes para esta temporada alta que es la de fin de año ya que necesita ampliar más su puesto así como las mesas que tiene para atender a sus clientes.
texts.en:
This client is a single mother who is working to raise the 3 children who are in her care.  She sells meals in the busiest market in the city.  She has an eatery in the street which she has been running for 10 years.

This loan is needed to take advantage of the number of customers which she has at this end-of-year high season since she needs to expand her stall as well as the number of tables at which she serves her customers.

loans.use: Purchase of basic grains and ingredients

loans.name: Irene Concepción

texts.es:
La Sra.  Irene Concepción M.  tiene el negocio de Venta de Ropa usada en el Barrio de Sutiaba su jornada laboral comienza desde la 8:00 Am  donde la Sra.  Irene M. comienza a arreglar su negocio y lo cierra hasta la 5:30 Pm  todos los días de la Semana.   
  
 Este crédito fue utilizado para la compra  de pacas de Ropa Usada.
texts.en:
Mrs Irene Concepción M. has a second-hand clothes business in the Sutiaba neighborhood.  Her work day begins at 8.00am when she begins to set up her business and ends at 5.30pm every day of the week.

This loan was used to buy packets of second-hand clothes.

loans.use: Purchase of packets of clothes

loans.name: Gerardo Ramón

texts.es: El señor Gerardo V. A. labora para UPONIC como guarda de seguridad es casado con dos personas a su cargo y solicita C$ 2,500 córdobas para hacerse unos exámenes de la vista y comprar sus lentes. Agradece a CEPRODEL por su beligerancia.
texts.en:
Gerardo works for UPONIC as a security guard.  He is married and has two dependents.  

Gerardo is requesting 2,500 Córdobas to pay for eye exams and to buy his lenses.  He is grateful to CEPRODEL for its determined help.

loans.use: FOR EYE EXAM COSTS AND EYE GLASSES

loans.name: Henry Cristobal

texts.es:
HENRY CRISTOBAL Q. M., Trabaja como Contador Analista en la Universidad Nacional Automona de Nicaragua.

es padre de familia de tres hijos y estos se encuentran en edad escolar, el prestamos solicitado es para la compra de materialesd de construccion como: ladrillos, cemento y mano de obra para la su casa de habitacion.
texts.en: HENRY CRISTOBAL Q. M. works as an accountant at the Autonomous National University of Nicaragua.  He is the father in a family of three children, all of whom are of school age.  The loan applied for is for the purchase of construction materials for his house such as bricks and cement and to pay workers.

loans.use: He is going to use it for improvements to his dwelling and for some family expenses.

loans.name: Liberia Silvia

texts.es:
Esta clienta cuenta con un pequeño negocio que se ha venido superando con los créditos que se le han otorgado , en eta ocasión solicita le crédito para surtir su negocio ya que las mejores ventas del año están por llegar que es la temporada de navidad y fin de año 
Por lo que necesita el crédito para invertir en el negocio
Ya que de esta manera es que mantiene a sus 3 nietos que tiene a su cargo
texts.en:
Liberia has a small business which she has been maintaining with loans she received. On this occasion, she is soliciting a loan to resupply her business, since the best sales of the year are coming up, which is the Christmas season and the end of the year.

She needs a loan to invest in her business to help support the 3 grandchildren that she has under her care.

loans.use: BUYING MERCHANDISE SUCH AS CANDY AND COSTUME JEWELRY

loans.name: Cedrick

texts.es:
CEDRICK D. Z., Trabaja Como Responsable de Ofina en la Universidad Nacional Ingeniería.es padre de familia pero ya no tiene hijos a sucargo ya que estos actualmente no estan con el y son mayores de edad.
el prestamo solicitado es para comprar materiales de construccion para construir una pared de su cuarto
texts.en:
CEDRICK D. Z. works as an office manager at the National Engineering University [Universidad Nacional Ingeniería]. He is a father but no longer has children in his care, since they are grown and no longer live with him. 

The loan he is requesting is to buy construction materials to build a wall in his room.

loans.use: Renovating his home by reinforcing and plastering walls in his house, and paying for some family expenses

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Justo Pastor

texts.es:
El Sr. Justo Pastor M. tiene el negocio de venta de Gaseosa, Cigarros y Cervezas y tiene 2 mesas de billar su jornada laboral inicia desde la 2:00 Pm hasta la 12:00  Pm

 Este crédito fue utilizado para la compra  de Cervezas, Gaseosa y Cigarros.

El Sr: Justo Pastor M. está muy agradecido con Ceprodel ya que con los Préstamo Otorgado ha mejorado su vida y su negocio por que ha crecido y con las ganancia ha mejorado su vivienda porque ante era de zinc y plástico y ahora es de Bloques.
texts.en:
Sr. Justo Pastor M. has a business selling soft drinks, small cigars, and beer. He also has 2 billard tables. His work day is from 2:00 p.m. until midnight. This loan will be used for the purchase of beer, soft drinks, and small cigars.

Sr: Justo Pastor M. is very grateful to Ceprodel since with the loans granted to him he has improved his life and his business, which has grown. With the profits he has improved his dwelling. Previously it was made of zinc sheeting and plastic and now it is made from concrete blocks.

loans.use: Purchase of soft drinks, beer and small cigars.

loans.name: Victoria De La Concepcion

texts.es:
La señora Victoria de la Concepcion M. N. es trabajadora de la Alcaldia de Chinandega con quien tenemos convenios con deducciones de salarios quincenales, es casada tiene 2 hijos en edades escolares trabaja con CEPRODEL desde el 2007 y ha obtenido 5 creditos.

Doña Victoria M. N. Solicito credito para ponerse al dia con pagos de mensualidades de la Universidad ya que de no estar al dia no le permitirian hacer examenes.
texts.en:
Mrs. Victoria is a hardworking resident of the town of Chinandega. Chinandega has an arrangement with CEPRODEL where they can deduct loan payments every fifteen days from a person’s salary. Mrs. Victoria is married with two school-aged children. She has worked with CEPRODEL since 2007 and has had five loans with them.
Mrs. Victoria is asking for this loan in order to make monthly payments to the university. If she is not up to date on her payments, they will not let her take her exams.

loans.use: Personal expenses (education)

loans.name: Mirna Auxiliadora

texts.es:
MIRNA AUXILIADORA F., Trabaja como Afanadora en el Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería 
el prestamo solicitado es para la compra de materiales de constrcuccion como . arena, cemento y piedra para la construccion de un cuarto en su casa de habitacion.
texts.en: Mirna works as a laborer at the National University of Engineering. The loan that she is requesting will be used to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, and stone. These materials will be used to build a room in her home.

loans.use: She will use the loan to buy construction materials to be used to remodel a room in her home.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Esta clienta es vendedora de verduras en el mercado central de la ciudad tiene un pequeño lugar en la que oferta sus productos en canastos. 
Tiene 15 años de experiencia en la venta de verduras y esta solicitando el crédito para la compra de verduras que se vende mas para las comidas de navidad y fin de años que es cuando se mejoran las ventas.
Y de esa maneras mantener a sus 2 hijos y que trabajan junto a ella
texts.en: This client sells vegetables in the central market in the city. She has a small place where she sells her product from baskets. She has been selling vegetables for the past fifteen years. She is asking for this loan in order to buy vegetables as she sells more vegetables at this time of year.  The vegetables will be used for Christmas and New Year’s meals. This time of year is when her sales improve. She uses this job to support her two children. The children work with her.

loans.use: She will buy vegetables for the Christmas season

loans.name: Gioconda Lisseth

texts.es:
GIOCONDA LISSETH Z. A., trabaja como Jefe de Despacho en la Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería. es madre de familia de un niño y este se encuentra en edad escolar.
el prestamo solicitado es para la compra de zinc, madera, pintura y mano de obra para su casa de habitacion.
texts.en:
Gioconda works as the head dispatcher at the National University of Engineering. She is a mother with a school-aged son.
She is asking for this loan in order to buy zinc, wood, paint and workers who will work on her house.

loans.use: She is going to use the money to replace the roof and door of her house.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Carlos Xavier

texts.es:
Este cliente que se dedica a la reparación de vehículos en un taller de vulcanizadora tiene 5 años de experiencia en este trabajo es un hombre que trabaja para mantener a su familia que son 3 hijos y su esposa le taller lo tiene ubicado en un barrio de la ciudad
Esta solicitando el crédito para la compra de accesorios para la reparación de los vehículos y también repara el motor que utiliza para la generación de aire que es indispensable en le taller
texts.en: This borrower works repairing vehicles at a tire repair shop.  He has five years of experience in this job.  He is a man who works to support his family, which is made up of his three children and his wife.  His shop is located in a neighborhood of the city.  He is requesting this loan to buy tools for repairing the vehicles, and also to fix the motor that he uses for generating air, which is indispensable to his shop.

loans.use: to buy tools for repairing vehicles, and to fix the motor on his air pump

loans.name: Ángela Del Carmen

texts.es: La Sra. Ángela del Carmen R. A. es trabajadora Activa de la  Alcaldía Municipal  San Rafael del Sur desempeñándose como colectora de impuestos, tiene un año de trabajar para esta institución, tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos  créditos con CEPRODEL y  uno lo ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para  ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo esta solicitando para la compra de una paca de Ropa usada por que ella aparte de su trabajo de dedica a la venta de ropa usada, de cuales  los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella  ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Ms. Ángela del Carmen R. A. is an active government employee of the Municipality of San Rafael del Sur, where she works as a tax collector.  She has been doing this job for the municipality for one year.  She has one school-age son.  She has taken out two loans through CEPRODEL:  The first was to buy construction materials to expand and improve her house, and this one is to buy a bale of used clothing.  Along with her job, she also works selling used clothing.  These loans from CEPRODEL have been of great benefit, as they have been the means through which she has improved her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy used clothing to resell

loans.name: Fernando Antonio

texts.es:
FERNANDO ANTONIO P. H., Trabaja como Colector en  Commema  en el Mercado Oriental.
es padre de familia de cuatro hijos y dos de ellos se encuentran en edad escolar. el prestamos solicitado es para la compra de materiales electricos para su casa de habitacion.
texts.en: Fernando Antonio P. H. works as a collector for COMMEMA [the Municipal Organization of Managua Markets] in the West Market.  He is the father of a family with four children, two of which are school-age.  He is requesting this loan to buy electrical materials for his home.

loans.use: to re-do the electrical system in his home

loans.name: Ana Basilia

texts.es:
Esta clienta tiene un puesto de muebles rústicos de artesanos locales y venta de artesanía 
Este crédito lo necesita para la compra de mas mercadería por que las ventas se incrementan en estos meses finales del año 
Esta señora es madre de 5 hijos los cuales depende del negocio el cual es le único ingreso que posee la familia
texts.en:
This borrower has a stand where she sells rustic furniture from local artisans, as well as crafts.
She needs this loan to buy more merchandise because her sales rise during the last months of the year.
Ana is the mother of five children who depend on her business, as it provides the family's only income.

loans.use: to buy wood for her business

loans.name: Ángel Jonathan
