Shalom Isabel plans to use her loan for $300 USD to increase her business capital.  She would like to buy cosmetics, perfume, earrings, necklaces, aftershave, etc.

She is grateful for the opportunity which she is being offered with this loan and she pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics, perfume, earrings, necklaces, aftershave, etc.

loans.name: Amadu

texts.en: Here is Amadu B., a micro entrepreneur from Kabala, a town in Northern Sierra Leone. This 25-year-old husband is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 leones for the first time from SMT/Kiva lenders in order to expand his business. He sells assorted goods – cottons, jeans, shirts, shoes, bed sheets, briefcases, etc. Amadu usually travels to neighboring Guinea to buy the goods he sells. With the help of this Kiva loan, Amadu will be able to expand his business by buying stock wholesale. Consequently, his business will improve both in size and quality and, eventually, Amadu will be able to overcome his current greatest challenge which is to have a shop or store to accommodate more goods. Currently, he sells his goods in a stall at the market.

loans.use: To buy cottons, jeans, shirts, shoes, bed sheets, briefcases, etc., in large quantity

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en: This is fifty-year-old Hawa K.. Born in Yogomaia, a village near Kabala, this wife and mother of five children is a small-scale businesswoman in Kabala town. Hawa K. wants a loan of SLL 3,000,000 to invest in her business. She sells husk-rice, ground-nuts, and palm oil. She has been in business for ten years now. Hawa travels to a village called Firawa to buy the goods she sells. With the help of this loan, she will buy husk-rice, groundnuts, and palm oil in large quantity to sell.

loans.use: Buy husk-rice, groundnuts, and palm oil in large quantity to sell

loans.name: Ahmed Foday

texts.en: Pictured here is Ahmed Foday K.. The thirty-year-old was born in Kabala town; he is single with one child. Ahmed sells assorted goods – photo albums, body creams, toiletries, cards, etc. He travels to the capital city Freetown (about 624 km both ways) to buy the goods he sells. This loan will definitely limit the number of trips he will have to make, increase his business size and quality, and increase his sales-to-profit-margin.

loans.use: Buy photo albums, body creams, toiletries, cards, etc.

loans.name: Fe En Dios Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “FE EN DIOS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a L. provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

El socio es L. Sr. Aurelio; él es conviviente y tiene 3 Hijos; El socio se dedica a trabajar en una empresa D. seguridad como jefe D. operaciones llamada Metro Segurity, el trabaja desD. las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, su esposa se dedica a trabajar en un restaurant y juntos sacan adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere tener una tienda D. abarrotes El socio solicita el préstamo para L. mantención D. su casa, para comprar alimentos como leche, azúcar y arroz.

Los otros socios  se dedican a L. venta D. artesanía, venta D. pinturas, venta D. ropa, venta D. cosméticos, venta D. casacas.
 
L. socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “Fe en Dios” (Faith in God) Communal Bank.  This bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Aurelio is in a common-law marriage and has three children.  He works in a security company, Metro Segurity, as chief of operations.  He works from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m.  His wife works in a restaurant, and together they get their children ahead.

He wants to have a grocery store.  He is requesting a loan for home maintenance and to buy food like milk, sugar, and rice.

The other members sell handicrafts, sell paintings, sell clothes, sell cosmetics, or sell jackets.

He is grateful to those who make this dream possible, and he promises to complete his payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: For home maintenance and to buy food like milk, sugar, and rice

loans.name: Donathille

texts.en:
Donathille is 35 years old. She is married and has five children between the ages of three and fifteen. Her husband is a businessman selling a variety of products.

Donathille has a retail shop and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, biscuits and cooking oil. She has had this business for three years.  With this loan she will buy more sugar, soap and cooking oil to sell.  

With the profits from this business, Donathille will provide for her family. She says that her business is well-known by people in her community.  In the future, she plans to have a bigger shop.

loans.use: To buy sugar, soap, and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Assouma

texts.en: Assouma is 20 years old. She is married and has one child who is two and a half years old. Her husband is a businessman selling second-hand clothes. Assouma sells clothes as well. She has spent two years in this business. With this loan she will buy more clothes to sell. She plans to build a house with profits made from this business. She says that her business is successful because of its strategic location in relation to her customers.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Jose Ernesto

texts.es:
El señor José Ernesto M. labora para MATECSA como obrero es casado tiene dos hijos a sus cargo.
Este es el segundo crédito que trabaja con CEPRODEL los cuales han sido para mejorar su casa cambio de techo y compra de materiales de construcción para dar una mejor comodidad a su familia por lo que agradece a CEPRODEL  por su agil atención.
texts.en:
Mr José Ernesto M. works for MATESCA as a workman.  He is married and has two children in his care.

This is his second loan from CEPRODEL.  His loan will be used to improve his house, replace his roof and buy building materials to make his family more comfortable.  He thanks CEPRODEL for their ready attention.

loans.use: To improve his home

loans.name: Lucila Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Lucila Del Carmen tiene 26 años, es madre soltera. Ella se dedica al negocio de la venta de mercadería en general, la cual distribuye de manera ambulante y también en su casa. Tiene 3 años de tener este negocio. La señora empezó este negocio con muy poca cantidad de productos ya que en ese tiempo compraba muy poco, ahora ella compra por mayores cantidades, ya que vende mucho más que antes, y  posee mayor cantidad de compradores. El financiamiento será invertido en la compra de calzado, ropa, perfumes y toallas las cuales ya tiene los compradores, ya que ellos fueron los que le encargaron los productos. Su meta siempre ha sido poder establecer su negocio, de tal manera que pueda vender al por mayor.
texts.en: Lucila Del Carmen is 26 years old and a single mother. Her business is selling general merchandise, which she distributes as a mobile vendor and also in her home. She has had this business for 3 years. She began this business with a very small quantity of products, since at that time she bought very little. Now she buys her products in greater quantities, since she sells a lot more than before, and she has a larger number of buyers. The loan will be invested in buying shoes, clothing, perfumes and towels, for which she already has buyers, since they were the ones who ordered the products. Her goal has always been to be able to establish her business so that she can sell on a wholesale basis.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Silvia Esperanza

texts.es: La Sra. Silvia Esperanza C. es originaria del municipio de El Sauce, su negocio consiste en brindar servicio de un molino a la población de dicho municipio donde tiene 26 años de dedicarse a esta actividad. Tiene un año de trabajar con Ceprodel donde le han otorgado dos créditos para la compra de repuestos para el molino. El crédito lo solicitó para la compra de discos, bandas, balineras y barras para el buen funcionamiento del molino.
texts.en: Mrs Silvia Esperanza C. is originally from the town of El Sauce.  Her business is providing milling services to the residents of the town.  She has been performing this service there for 26 years.  She has been working with CEPRODEL for one year and has had two loans to buy spare parts for her mill.  This loan will be used to buy discs, bands, ball-bearings and rods so that her mill works well.

loans.use: To buy discs, bands, ball-bearings and rods

loans.name: Noussirath

texts.fr: Z. Noussirath est née en 1986 et vit depuis dix (10) ans environs à Midombo, un quartier de Cotonou, la capitale économique du Bénin.  Noussirath est mariée à HOUNHOUI Louis, un électricien auto. Noussirath est analphabète et mère d’un enfant qui est scolarisé. Le couple vit ensemble avec leur enfant et supporte mutuellement les différentes charges familiales. Noussirath mène de façon ambulante comme activité principale la vente de pâtes dentifrices. En dehors de cette activité, Noussirath vend aussi des produits cosmétiques. C’est pour faire face à l’évolution de son activité et augmenter le stock de ses produits (pâtes dentifrices et brosses à dents) que Noussirath sollicite pour la troisième fois auprès de ALIDé un crédit. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés. Les ambitions personnelles de Noussirath sont d’avoir sa propre boutique et de prospérer dans son commerce ; mais Noussirath enregistre rarement quelques problèmes au cours de l’exercice de son activité.
texts.en:
Noussirath Z. was born in 1986 and for the last 10 years she has been living in Midombo, a neighborhood of Cotonou, the economic capital of Benin. Noussirath is married to Louis Hounhoui, an automobile electrician. She is illiterate and the mother of a child attending school. The couple lives together with their child and shares in supporting the various family expenses.

Noussirath goes from place to place selling toothpastes. In addition to this activity, she also sells cosmetic products. To deal with the growth of her business and to increase her stock of goods (toothpastes and toothbrushes) Noussirath is requesting a loan for the third time from ALIDé. The previous loans have been fully reimbursed. 

Her personal ambition is to have her own shop and for her business to thrive. She rarely encounters any problems while running her business.

loans.use: Purchase of personal care products (toothpaste, toothbrush)

loans.name: Rosa Matilde

texts.es: Rosa Matilde tiene 62 años. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos, pues han sido de gran ayuda para su negocio. Ella se dedica a un bazar trabajo que realiza desde hace mas de 13 años pues ha demostrado ser una mujer muy responsable   con el paso del tiempo es que ha mejorado su actividad. Este crédito es para la compra de botones, hilos, cintas, zipper entre otras cosas que son útiles para su negocio. Su meta es seguir apoyando a sus hijos en lo que pueda.
texts.en: Rosa Matilde is 62 years old.  This is not the first time that she has taken a loan.  They have been a great help to her business.  She has a store where she sells sewing supplies which she has had for more than 13 years.  She has shown herself to be a very responsible woman who, over time, has improved her business.  This loan will be used to buy buttons, thread, ribbons, zips, etc.  Her goal is to continue supporting her children as best she can.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Juvencia

texts.es: La Sra. Juvencia P. es originaria del municipio de Achuapa, actualmente se desempeña como maestra de educación primaria en la escuela de una comarca aledaña donde tiene 24 años de laborar. Tiene dos años de trabajar con Ceprodel. El crédito lo solicitó para la compra de hierro, cuarterón, arena, cemento, cerámica y pago de mano de obra con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Mrs Juvencia P. was born in the town of Achuapa.  She currently works as an elementary school teacher in an adjacent district where she has been working for 24 years.  She has been working with Ceprodel for two years.  Her loan will be used to buy iron, doors, sand, cement and tiles, and to pay for labor.  Her goal is to improve her home.

loans.use: To buy iron, doors, sand, cement and tiles and to pay for labor

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To improve his home

loans.name: Teresa Del Carmen

texts.es: La Sra. Teresa actualmente se desempeña como conserje en el Centro de Salud de dicho caserío donde tiene 20 años de laborar. Es el primer crédito que solicita en Ceprodel para la compra de ladrillos, cemento, arena y zinc con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Mrs Teresa currently works as a janitor in the  town's Health Centre.  She has been working there for 20 years.  This is her first loan from Ceprodel and she will use it to buy bricks, cement, sand and corrugated metal sheeting to improve her home.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement, sand and corrugated metal sheeting

loans.name: Edith Damaris

texts.es: La Sra. Edith actualmente se desempeña como enfermera en el Centro de Salud de dicha localidad donde tiene tres años de laborar. Es el primer crédito que solicita en Ceprodel para la compra de ladrillos, cemento y arena con el fin de mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Mrs Edith currently works as a nurse in the town's health center.  She has been working there for three years.  This is her first loan from Ceprodel and she will use it to buy bricks, cement and sand in order to improve her home.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement and sand

loans.name: Matilde Kobayé

texts.fr: A. Matilde Kobayé est née le 14 Mars 1979. Matilde est mariée à KOUSSEDO Jacob. Matilde est allée à l’école et s’est arrêtée au cours secondaire. Le couple a deux (02) enfants, tous scolarisés mais a en plus un autre enfant à leur charge. La famille vit à il y a environ trois ans à Suru- Léré, un des quartiers de Cotonou, la capitale économique du Bénin. Matilde assure ensemble avec son mari toutes les charges familiales. Matilde fait de la blanchisserie à son domicile. En dehors de cela Matilde vend de lait (« Jago » et « Milo »). Matilde s’approvisionne en produits (Omo, eau de javel, savons, etc.) lui permettant d’exercer son activité, à la droguerie ou à Dantokpa, le marché international du Bénin. C’est pour rehausser le niveau de son activité et augmenter le stock des produits que Matilde sollicite pour la troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits précédents que Matilde a reçu auprès de l’institution ALIDé ont  été bien remboursés. Matilde rencontre quelques problèmes dans l’exercice de son activité.
texts.en: Matilde Kobayes A.  was born March 14, 1979. She is married to Jacob Koussedo. Matilda went to school, leaving at the high school level. The couple has two children who are in school as well as another child in their care. For the past three years the family has been living in Suru-Lere, a neighborhood in Cotonou, the economic capital of Bénin. Together with her husband, Matilde takes care of all the family's expenses. Matilde does laundry in her home. In addition, she sells milk ("Jago" and "Milo"). Matilde stocks up on supplies (Omo [detergent], bleach, soaps, etc.)so that she can operate her business at the drugstore or in Dantokpa, the international market of Bénin. Matilde is requesting a third loan from ALIDé to expand her business and increase her stock of products.   The previous loans that Matilde received from ALIDé have been fully repaid.  Matilde is encountering a few problems operating her business.

loans.use: To buy Omo (detergent), bleach, manioc starch and other chemical products

loans.name: Edda Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Edda Del Socorro tiene 60 años, es madre soltera y posee 4 hijos y dos son menores de edad a su cargo. La señora Edda se dedica a la venta de útiles escolares y cosméticos, pues no solamente esta experiencia ha obtenido con estos negocios ya que anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de ropa, pues vive en una pequeña comunidad rural, esta no es la primera experiencia que ha obtenido con créditos, ya que con mucho esfuerzo ha salido adelante. Todos los días se levanta temprano para atender a sus clientes que le solicitan variedad de productos. El financiamiento es para la  compra de cuadernos, lápices, borradores, resaltadores, hojas y cosméticos.
texts.en: Edda Del Socorro is 60 years old. She is a single mother and has 4 children: two are not yet adults and still in her care. Edda's work is selling school supplies and cosmetics. She has obtained her experience not only from these businesses, but also from her previous work selling clothing. She lives in a small rural community, and this is not her first experience with loans. Through great effort, she has been able to get ahead. Every day, she gets up early to serve her customers, who request a variety of products from her. This loan is for buying notebooks, pencils, erasers, highlighters, paper and cosmetics.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Cecelia Aba Nyarkoa

texts.en: Cecelia Aba Nyarkoa E. is divorced and has three children. She has received senior high education. Cecelia is a hairdresser at Asenadze near Abura. She has been in this trade for fifteen years. Cecelia uses the income she makes to take care of her children.  The loan will enable her to purchase more hair products to use on customers' hair. With the new profits from her expanded business, Cecelia plans to buy an additional hair dryer.

loans.use: purchase more hair products

loans.name: Gloria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Gloria es una mujer emprendedora, casada, madre de seis hijos, de los cuales solo dos tiene a su cargo, ya que los otros son casados. 
Tiene su propio negocio, una pequeña pulpería, que inicio hace varios años con pocos productos en donde su esposo dio parte del dinero para comenzar, producto de su trabajo como cadete en un taxi.
Luego a través del financiamiento que Afodenic da. Comienza  a invertir más en granos básicos lo que para ella,  ha sido de gran apoyo económico habiendo mejorado en sus ganancias.
Ahora con este préstamo, aumentara productos de cereales, golosinas, leche en pote, productos condimentados para los alimentos, granos básicos, logrando a si crecer para un mejor equilibrio económico.
texts.en:
Gloria is an enterprising woman, married, mother of six children, two of which are still in her care, as the others are married. 
She has her own business, a small local store, which she started several years ago with a few products to start with which her husband gave her money for, from his work as a taxi driver.
Then through the financing given by Afodenic she started to invest more in staple foods, and for her it has been a great financial support having improved her profits.
Now with this loan, she will increase her cereal products, candies, jars of milk, food seasonings, and staple foods, trying to achieve growth for a better financial balance.

loans.use: Invest in staple food products, cereals, candies, milk products to improve sales

loans.name: Lucía

texts.es: La Sra. Lucía M. es originaria del municipio de El Sauce, su negocio consiste en la venta de ropa nueva y artículos para el hogar donde tiene 23 años de dedicarse a este negocio. Tiene cuatro años de trabajar con Ceprodel donde se le han otorgado seis créditos para dicho negocio. El crédito lo solicitó para la compra de pantalones, ropa interior, blusas, zapatos y artículos del hogar con el objetivo de satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en: Mrs. Lucía M. is from the city of El Sauce, Nicaragua. Her business is the sale of new clothing and items for the home. She has 23 years of experience in this business. She has been working with Ceprodel for four years. They have granted her six loans for her business. She has asked for this loan to buy pants, underwear, shirts, shoes and items for the home. It is her objective to satisfy the demands of her customers.

loans.use: To purchase pants, underwear, capris, shirts, shoes, and items for the home.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda tiene 80 años, vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, Perú y desD. hace mucho tiempo que participa en el banco comunal “Patrón D. San Sebastián” D. la Unidad D. Micro finanzas Arariwa. Yolanda se considera una persona trabajadora y emprendedora, ella tiene una chacra en la provincia D. la Convención del departamento del Cusco donD. siembre y cosecha café y plátanos.
 
Yolanda con su próximo préstamo que espera recibir D. $ 450 USD, ella invertirá el dinero para pagar a los peones que trabajan en la chacra. 

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 80 years old and lives in the beautiful city of Cusco, Peru.  She has been a member of Arariwa's “Patrón D. San Sebastián” community bank for a long time.  Yolanda considers herself to be a hard-working and enterprising person.  She has a farm in the province of Convención in the department of Cusco where she sows and harvests coffee and bananas.

Yolanda will use her loan for $450USD to pay the laborers who work on her farm.

She is grateful for the opportunity which she is being given with this loan and therefore pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To pay the laborers who work on her farm

loans.name: Luzmila Elvira

texts.es:
Luzmila tiene 51 años, vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, Perú y desde hace mucho tiempo que participa en el banco comunal “Patrón de San Sebastián” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa. Luzmila se considera una persona trabajadora y emprendedora, ella tiene un negocio que consiste en alquilar departamentos y ella se encarga de la administración del negocio.  

Luzmila con su próximo préstamo que espera recibir de $ 500 USD, ella invertirá el dinero para hacer mantenimiento de los departamentos y comprara pintura para hacer pintar las habitaciones.  

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Luzmila is 51 years old and lives in the beautiful city of Cusco, Peru.  She has been a member of Arariwa's “Patrón de San Sebastián” community bank for a long time.  Luzmila considers herself to be a hard-working and enterprising person.  She has a business renting out apartments and she is in charge of the running of the business.

Luzmila plans to use her loan for $500USD to maintain her apartments.  She will buy paint to paint the rooms.

She is grateful for the opportunity which she is being given with this loan and therefore pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To paint rooms

loans.name: Cira Silva

texts.es:
Cira tiene 51 años, vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, Perú y desD. hace mucho tiempo que participa en el banco comunal “Patrón D. San Sebastián” D. la Unidad D. Micro finanzas Arariwa. Cira es docente y se considera una persona trabajadora y emprendedora, ella está casada y fruto esta unión tiene un hijo.   

Luzmila con su próximo préstamo que espera recibir D. $ 500 USD, ella invertirá el dinero para realizar uno D. sus sueños D. viajar al extranjero. 

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Cira is 51 years old and lives in the beautiful city of Cuzco, Peru. For a long time she has been involved in the Patron of Saint Sebastian Community Bank through the Arariwa Microfinance program. Cira is a teacher and is considered to be a hard-working and enterprising person. She is married with a son.

She hopes to receive $500 from her next loan and will use the money to fulfill her dream of traveling abroad.

She is very thankful for the opportunity given her through this program and is committed to repaying her loan according to schedule.

loans.use: To fulfill her dream of traveling abroad

loans.name: Yaneth

texts.es:
Yaneth tiene 68 años y vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, Perú, ella desde hace mucho tiempo que participa en el banco comunal “Patrón de San Sebastián” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa. Yaneth es madre soltera pues su pareja la abandono con sus dos hijos, ella es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora pues tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes donde vende comestibles y productos navideños.    
 
Yaneth con su próximo préstamo que espera recibir de $ 450 USD, ella invertirá el dinero para aumentar el capital del negocio y desea comprar productos navideños como por ejemplo panetones, arreglos navideños y muchas cosas. 

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Yaneth is 68 years old and lives in the beautiful city of Cusco, Peru.  She has been a member of Arariwa's “Patrón de San Sebastián” community bank for a long time.  Yaneth is a single mother since her partner abandoned her together with her two children.  She is a hard-working and enterprising woman who has a small grocery store where she sells groceries and Christmas products.

Yaneth plans to use her loan for $450USD to increase her business capital.  She would like to buy Christmas products such as panettones, Christmas arrangements and many other things.

She is grateful for the opportunity which she is being given with this loan and therefore pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy Christmas products such as panettones, Christmas arrangements and many other products

loans.name: Marisela Del Carmen

texts.es:
Marisela  es una joven muy trabajadora, se dedica al comercio de venta de ropa, zapatos y productos de cosméticos.
Iniciando hace tres años, con poco dinero, que le dieron de su liquidación y que ha venido invirtiendo con el apoyo de Afodenic por medio del financiamiento lo que ha logrado aprovechar para su crecimiento en inventario y que le ha ayudado para suplir sus necesidades personales.
Con este nuevo financiamiento comprara ropa variada para dama, niños y caballeros, zapatos y parte en productos de cosméticos ya que es lo que más vende a sus clientes. Sus planes es poder comprar vitrinas para tener mejor vista, logrando el aumento de sus ventas.
texts.en:
Marisela is a young, hard-working woman who sells clothing, shoes and cosmetics.
She began three years ago with little money which she received from her sales and she has been using it for the business with the support of Afodenic. With the loans that she  has received, she has been able to grow her inventory and these loans have also helped her with personal needs.
With this new loan she will buy assorted clothing for women, men and children, shoes, and Marisela will use some for cosmetics which is what she sells the most to her customers.  Her plans are to buy showcases to better display the products, so that her sales will improve.

loans.use: To buy assorted clothing for men, women and chldren, shoes and cosmetic products

loans.name: Lena

texts.es:
Lena tiene 44 años y vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, Perú, ella desde hace mucho tiempo que participa en el banco comunal “Patrón de San Sebastián” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa. Lena es madre soltera pues su pareja la abandono con sus dos hijos, ella es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora pues tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de productos por catalogo, ella da los productos a crédito a sus amigas y familiares. Después de un mes Lena tiene que cobrar el valor del producto.     
 
Lena con su próximo préstamo que espera recibir de $ 300 USD, ella invertirá el dinero para aumentar el capital del negocio y desea pagar a la empresa del catalogo los productos que fueron pedidos por sus clientes como prendas de vestir, perfumes, aretes y muchas cosas más. 

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Lena is 44 years old and lives in the beautiful city of Cusco, Peru.  She has been a member of Arariwa's “Patrón de San Sebastián” community bank for a long time.  Lena is a single mother since her partner abandoned her and her two children.  She is a hard-working and enterprising woman since she has a small business selling catalog products.  She sells the products on credit to her friends and family members and a month later she has to collect payment for them.

Lena plans to use her loan for $300 to increase her business capital.  She would like to be able to pay the catalog company for products which her customers have ordered such as clothing, perfume, earrings, etc.

She is grateful for the opportunity which she is being given with this loan and therefore pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To pay the catalog company for products ordered

loans.name: Leopoldo

texts.es: El señor Leopoldo trabaja en MATECSA desde hace 5 años ha tenido de CEPRODEL 3 créditos los cual e son para mejorar poco a poco su vivienda compra de cin y Madera para reparar el techo.
texts.en: Sr Leopoldo has worked for MATESCA for 5 years and has had 3 CEPRODEL loans to gradually improve his home by purchasing zinc and wood to repair the roof.

loans.use: Home improvements.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Norma Del Socorro

texts.es: Norma Del Socorro tiene 45 años. Norma alterna su actividad del hogar con la pequeña negocio, ella tiene en su domicilio una pequeña pulpería donde expende productos como arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite y muchas cosas más. Inicio fue con la ayuda de su Mama quien le enseño este negocio para que ella pudiera sacar adelante a su familia y logro hacerlo con mucho sacrificio y esmero. Con este préstamo que espera ella invertirá el dinero para aumentar el capital del negocio y desea comprar para esta época navideña que se está acercando dulces, galletas, bebidas, jugos entre otras cosas etc. Ella encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente.
texts.en: Norma Del Socorro is 45 years old.  She divides her time between her household chores and her small business.  She has a small grocery store in her home where she sells products such as rice, sugar, noodles, oil and many other things besides.  She started out with the help of her mom who taught her the business so that she could help her family get ahead.  She managed to accomplish this with a lot of sacrifice and effort.  She plans to use this loan to increase her business capital and would like to buy items for the Christmas period which is approaching such as sweets, cookies, drinks, juices, etc. She is grateful for the opportunity which she is being given with this loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Philomène

texts.fr: V. Philomène est veuve de feu GANDONOU Mathias avec qui elle a eu quatre(04)enfants dont un est à sa charge. Philomène est analphabète et vit depuis trente(30)environs à Akpakpa, un des quartiers de Cotonou,la capitale économique du Bénin. Philomène mène comme activité il ya vingt (20) ans environs la vente de nourriture (pâte, riz et la sauce) et également du gaz oïl au carrefour de Dédokpo, un quartier de Cotonou.Philomène fait l’achat de ses produits (sacs de riz, sacs de maïs et condiments) à Dantokpa, le marché international du Bénin. C’est dans le cadre de l’augmentation de son fonds de roulement et de son stock en sacs de riz, condiments que Philomène sollicite pour la quatrième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé.Philomène enregistre parfois la mévente ce qui a entraine quelques retards pour le remboursement des crédits antérieurs
texts.en:
Philomène V. is the widow of the late Mathias Gandonou, with whom she had four children, one of them still in her care. 

For the past thirty years or so, Philomène, who is illiterate, has been living in Akpakpa, a district of Cotonou, the economic capital of Benin. 

For about twenty years, Philomène has been selling food (pasta, rice and sauce) and gas-oil (fuel oil) at the crossroads of Dédokpo, another district of Cotonou.

Philomène buys her stocks (bags of rice, bags of maize and condiments) in Dantokpa, the international market of Benin. She is seeking a fourth loan from ALIDé to increase her working capital and her stocks. Occasional drops in sales have caused her to experience delays in the repayment of previous loans.

loans.use: Buying bags of rice and sauce condiments

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
Maria Cristina tiene 43 años y vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, Perú, ella desde hace mucho tiempo que participa en el banco comunal “Patrón de San Sebastián” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa. Maria Cristina es madre soltera pues su pareja la abandono con su hijo, ella es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora pues tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa de baño y muchas cosas más. 
 
Maria Cristina con su próximo préstamo que espera recibir de $ 400 USD, ella invertirá el dinero para aumentar el capital del negocio y desea comprar mas ropa como por ejemplo toallas, polos, etc. 

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Maria Cristina is 43 years old and lives in the beautiful city of Cusco, Peru.  She has been a member of Arariwa's “Patrón de San Sebastián” community bank for a long time.  Maria Cristina is a single mother since her partner abandoned her and her child.  She is a hard-working and enterprising woman who has a small business selling swimsuits and many other things.

Maria Cristina plans to use her loan for $400USD to increase her business capital.  She would like to buy more merchandise such as towels, polo shirts etc.

She is grateful for the opportunity which she is being given with this loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise such as towels, polo shirts, etc.

loans.name: Maria Emperatriz

texts.es:
Maria Emperatriz tiene 46 años y vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, Perú, ella desde hace mucho tiempo que participa en el banco comunal “Patrón de San Sebastián” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa. Maria Emperatriz es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene dos hijos, ella es docente cesante y actualmente se dedica a la venta de zapatos, ropa y bisutería. 

Maria Emperatriz con su próximo préstamo que espera recibir de $ 1000 USD, ella invertirá el dinero para aumentar el capital del negocio y desea comprar zapatos y ropa.  

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Maria Emperatriz is 46 years old and lives in the beautiful city of Cusco, Peru.  She has been a member of Arariwa's “Patrón D. San Sebastián” community bank for a long time.  Maria Emperatriz is married and has two children.  She is an out-of-work teacher who currently works selling shoes, clothes and jewelry.

Maria Emperatriz plans to use her loan for $1,000USD to increase her working capital.  She would like to buy shoes and clothes.

She is grateful for the opportunity which she is being given with this loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy shoes and clothes

loans.name: Maria Benigna

texts.es:
Maria Benigna tiene 65 años y vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, Perú, ella desde hace mucho tiempo que participa en el banco comunal “Patrón de San Sebastián” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa. Maria Benigna es viuda y tiene dos hijos, ella es cesante del servicio de salud  y actualmente se dedica a la elaboración y venta de manualidades como bandas, carteras y muchas cosas más. 

Maria Benigna con su próximo préstamo que espera recibir de $ 50 USD, ella invertirá el dinero para aumentar el capital del negocio y desea comprar materiales como cuero, tela, botones, etc.   

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Maria Benigna is 65 years old and lives in the beautiful city of Cusco, Perú. For a long time, she has participated in the “Patrón de San Sebastián” communal bank of Asociación Arariwa. Maria Benigna is a widow and has two children. She is retired from the Health Service and now works and making and selling handicrafts, such as hair bands, wallets, and many others.

With this loan of $50USD, Maria Benigna will invest in raw materials, such as leather, cloth, buttons, etc. She is grateful for the opportunity provided by this loan. She commits to making her payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: Buy material for handicrafts, such as leather, cloth, and buttons.

loans.name: Julia Maxmiliana

texts.es:
Julia Maxmiliana tiene 56 años y vive en la ciudad del Cusco, ella desde hace mucho tiempo que participa en el banco comunal “Patrón de San Sebastián” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa. Julia Maxmiliana es casada y tiene cuatro hijos, ella es costura de profesión y tiene un pequeño taller de costura en su domicilio donde brinda servicio de costura de la ropa de sus vecinos, ella también se dedica a la venta de productos de  belleza, ropa y zapatos. 

Julia Maxmiliana con su próximo préstamo que espera recibir de $ 800 USD, ella invertirá el dinero para aumentar el capital del negocio y desea comprar de la línea de cosméticos perfumes, ropa y zapatos de la línea de costura desea comprar materiales como por ejemplo tela, hilos, botones, etc.    

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Julia Maxmiliana is 56 years old and lives in the city of Cusco. She has been a member of the Communal Bank “Patron de San Sebastian” [Saint Sebastian Patron] of Arariwa Microfinance Unit for a long time. Julia Maxmiliana is married and has four children. She is a seamstress and has a small workshop in her house. She provides sewing services to her neighbors and also sells beauty products, clothes and shoes.

Julia Maxmiliana will invest the loan of $ 800.00 USD in the purchase of cosmetics, perfumes, clothes, shoes and sewing materials like fabric, thread and buttons.

She is very grateful for the opportunity provided and commits herself to make the payments according to schedule.

loans.use: To buy sewing materials: fabric, thread, buttons, etc

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana tiene 53 años y vive en la ciudad del Cusco, ella desD. hace mucho tiempo que participa en el banco comunal “Patrón D. San Sebastián” D. la Unidad D. Micro finanzas Arariwa. Juana es casada y tiene dos hijos, ella es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia, ella es profesora y enseña en colegio nacional D. la ciudad del Cusco. 

Juana con su próximo préstamo que espera recibir D. $100 USD, ella invertirá el dinero para gasto familiar como para comprar ropa para sus hijos. 
 
La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Juana is 53 years old and lives in the city of Cusco.  She is a long-standing member of the "Patrón D. San Sebastián" Communal Bank of Unidad Microfinanza Arariwa.  Juana is married and has two children.  She is a hard-working and enterprising mother who keeps her family going.  She is a teacher at Cusco's national school.

With her next loan of $100 USD that Juana hopes to receive, she will invest in household expenses such as buying clothes for her children.

She is grateful for the opportunity provided here, and she is committed to repaying the loan on schedule.

loans.use: For household expenses such as buying clothes for her children.

loans.name: La Loma De San Juan Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama La Loma de San Juan porque  la casa  de reunión se realiza en una loma en la localidad de san Juan,  el grupo está formado por 11 personas.La señora rosa Hernández  es casada tiene tres hijos, es la presidenta del grupo, la actividad a la que se dedica es la siembra de maíz, lo ocupa hasta que está convertido en mazorca listo para nixtamal, posteriormente elabora tortillas de comal, menciona que tiene a sus clientes por lo que la mitad de sus ventas son puros pedidos, así mismo tiene un puesto colocado en una población cercana a su casa. También se dedica a la siembra de frijol, lo desenvaina y lo vende por medios kilos. La clienta nos comenta que con las ganancias de la venta de sus tortillas y el frijol espera seguir ayudando a su esposo para darle escuela a sus hijos y sean personas de provecho.
texts.en: This group is called the Hill of San Juan because they meet on a hill in the town of San Juan.  The group is made up of 11 people.  Rosa Hernández is married and has three children.  She is the president of the group and grows corn.  When they are ready, the ears of corn are treated with lime, and are then used to make tortillas on a griddle.  She has customers, and half of her sales are orders.  She also has a stand located in a town near her house.  In addition, she grows beans, shells them, and sells them by the half kilo.  She tells us that with the earnings from the sale of her tortillas and beans she hopes to continue to help her husband give their children an education so they will be successful.

loans.use: Invest in her business

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Luis Alberto tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar con Fundación, por lo que no es la primera vez que realiza créditos. Su negocio es la venta y elaboración ladrillos de adobe y tejas. Inicio el oficio por su padre y estableció su propio taller hace ocho años. Luis tiene 1 hijo menor de edad a su cargo, pues ha sido difícil ya que las ventas han bajado, pero esto no lo desanima a seguir luchando. Con este crédito que Luis solicita comprar lo necesario para invertir más en materia prima para la elaboración de sus productos, el es un hombre muy responsable y está orgulloso de tener este negocio.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto’s business is making and selling adobe bricks and roof-tiles. He started this work because of his father and opened his own shop eight years ago. Luis provides for a young son, but it has been difficult because his sales have decreased. This does not discourage him from continuing to work hard.

Luis Alberto has worked with Fundación Leon for a long time, therefore this is not the first time he requests a loan. He will use this loan to buy raw materials to make the bricks and tiles. Luis Alberto is a responsible man and is very proud of his business.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Luis Gualberto

texts.es:
Luis tiene 70 años y vive en la ciudad del Cusco, él desde hace mucho tiempo que participa en el banco comunal “Patrón de San Sebastián” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa. Luis es casado y tiene cuatro hijos, él es un padre trabajador y emprendedor que saca adelante a su familia, él es profesor jubilado. 

Luis con su próximo préstamo que espera recibir de $200 USD, él invertirá el dinero para el gasto familiar y desea comprar ropa para sus hijos y otras cosas  más. 
 
El socio se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Luis is 70 years old and lives in the city of Cusco.  He has been a member of Arariwa's “Patrón de San Sebastián” community bank for a long time.  Luis is married with four children.  He is a hard-working and enterprising father who supports his family.  He is a retired teacher.

Luis plans to use his loan for $200 for family expenses.  He would like to buy clothes for his children and other things.

He is grateful for the opportunity which he is being given with this loan and pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy clothes for his children and other things

loans.name: Ángela Rosa

texts.es:
La clienta Ángela Rosa R. O.. Vive en departamento de León, Municipio Achuapa. Es una señora Soltera  trabaja actualmente en el Instituto San José desempeñándose en el cargo como Conserje y tiene 12 años de estar laborando en esta institución.
El cliente cuenta con una casa de habitación propia el cual la quiere Acondicionar.
El destino del crédito es para la Compra de zinc, Cemento y ladrillo, para el mejoramiento de su Vivienda, para mejorar el bienestar de vida de su familia.  Esto le permitirá que el cliente pueda obtener una mejor condición de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
The client Ángela Rosa R. O. lives in the district of León in the Achuapa municipality.  She a single woman who currently works in the San José Institute holding the post of custodian.  She has worked for this institution for 12 years.  

Ángela has her own home, which she wants to renovate.  She will use this loan to buy zinc, cement, and brick to improve her house, and to improve her family's well-being.  This will enable her to obtain a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: To buy cement, zinc, and brick

loans.name: Maria Erlinda

texts.es: Maria Erlinda tiene 51 años. Es una mujer viuda. Tiene 4 hijos pero solamente 1 está a su cargo. La actividad económica es la venta de abarrotes, hace más de 4 años que posee este negocio. La ubicación de su negocio es en su vivienda. Por lo que sus inicios surgen con muy poco capital, pero con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Por lo que tenía que pagar las cuentas de su vivienda y además proporcionarles a sus hijos estudios y alimentación. Poco a poco fue incrementando su inventario con las pocas ganancias que su negocio le generaba, sus clientes recurrían a su negocio ya que la atención de Maria es muy buena y además atiende a sus clientes con una sonrisa en sus labios. El financiamiento que solicita es para capital de trabajo para la compra de materia prima arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite y maíz. Su mayor sueño es seguir incrementando su negocio.
texts.en: Maria Erlinda is 51 years old.  She is a widow who has 4 children, only one of whom is in her care.  Her business is selling groceries.  She has been in this business for more than 4 years.  Her business is located in her home.  She started out with very little capital but a great desire to succeed.  She had to pay her household bills and also pay for her children's studies and food.  Little by little she increased her inventory with the small profits which her business made.  Her customers frequented her business because her customer service is very good and she serves her customers with a smile.  The loan which she is requesting is to increase her working capital and buy goods such as rice, sugar, beans, oil, etc.  Her greatest dream is to continue increasing her business.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
Estela es una pequeña comerciante de venta de ropa, zapatos y cosméticos,  pues ha venido vendiendo desde hace varios años, lo que inicio con ayuda de su compañero.
Y que por medio del financiamiento ha venido logrando mejores captación de ingresos lo que está contenta por la ayuda económica que la institución ha dado.
Con el crédito anterior logro terminar la mejora de un cuarto de alquiler en donde tiene ese dinero fijo que es para suplir las necesidades básicas.
Con este nuevo financiamiento, invertirá en la compra de pantalones variados para dama y caballero, zapatos y productos de cosméticos. Y así poder vender más.
texts.en:
Estela runs a small business selling clothes, shoes and cosmetics. She has been running this business for many years since she started it with the help of her partner.
She is happy with the economic assistance that she has received from the institution as the funding has allowed her to improve her income level.
With the previous loan she managed to complete improvements on a rented room which provides a fixed amount of income for her to cover her basic needs.
With this new funding she will purchase different styles of ladies' and men's trousers, shoes and cosmetics so that she will be able to increase her sales.

loans.use: To buy clothes, shoes and cosmetics in order to increase the investment.

loans.name: Andres Avelino Caceres Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “ANDRES AVELINO CACERES”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Martha; ella tiene 35 años D. edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia se dedica a la atención y venta D. caldos, ella atienD. desD. las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, prepara diferentes caldos D. pollo y carne, su esposo trabaja como cocinero y juntos sacan adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere tener un negocio propio. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carnes y verduras.

Los otros socios  se dedican a la venta D. animales, restaurant, artesanía, venta D. frutas y  venta D. chicha.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The group members belong to the communal bank "ANDRES AVELINO CACERES". This bank is situated in the Cusco district, in the province and department of Cusco.

One member of the group is Martha, who is 35 years old and lives with her partner and has 2 children. Martha prepares and sells soup, serving it from 9:00am until 6:00pm. She serves different soups maD. from chicken or meat. Her live-in partner works as a cook and together they raise their children. Martha wishes to have her own business. She is applying for the loan in order to buy products to cook, such as meat and vegetables.

The other members of the group sell animals, handicrafts, fruit, chicha (fermented beverage maD. from maize), and have a restaurant.

Martha is grateful to those who play a part in achieving this dream by these means and commits to making payments in the established repayment term.

loans.use: The group member is applying for a loan to buy products to cook such as meat and vegetables.

loans.name: Clever Jose

texts.es: Clever José tiene 22 años y vive en un municipio de achuapa, allí tiene su negocio que es brindar el servicio de nintendo. Su solicitud de crédito está encaminada a la compra de televisores, controles, discos y reparar ciertos equipos.  El emprendió su porque en este lugar nadie ofrece este servicio solamente él, pues es muy satisfactorio. Actualmente tiene clientes que viven muy cerca y llegan a su hogar a distraerse con los videos juegos.  Su gran sueño es consolidar su microempresa que es una de las mejores en el sector y que le permite  aumentar sus utilidades. Así mismo su gran desafío es trabajar con su poco capital por eso recurre a los financiamientos.
texts.en: Clever José is 22 years old and lives in the municipality of Achuapa where he has a business offering Nintendo services. The loan he is requesting will be used to purchase television sets, controls, records and to repair certain equipment. He launched his business at this site because no one offers this service, it is very satisfying. He currently has customers who live nearby and who come to his home to be distracted by the video games. His dream is to consolidate his small business which is one of the best in the area and which allows him to increase his profits. Also, his greatest challenge is to work with the little capital he has which is why he is requesting this financing.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Maria Danelia

texts.es: La señora Maria Danelia, tiene 31 años es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. La señora se dedica al negocio de venta de abarrotería y leña, el cual lo tiene ubicado en su vivienda que está localizado en un municipio llamado apanguera. Ella dio inicio a este negocio hace 6 años ella se considera una madre trabajadora y emprendedora. Este negocio fue iniciado por la necesidad de sufragar los gastos de su hogar, por lo que no es la primera vez que solicita créditos con Fundación pues han sido de gran ayuda.  El  sueño de Maria es llegar a tener una tienda grande y en la cual pueda vender ropa variada como  zapatos y cosmético todo desde un local bien establecido.
texts.en:
Maria Danelia, 31, is a single mother with two young children. Her business is the sale of groceries and firewood. The business is located in her home, which is a city called Apanguera.

Maria considers herself a hardworking and enterprising mother. She started her business six years ago out of the necessity of providing for the expenses of her household. She has had previous loans with Fundación Leon 2000, which have been a great help.

Maria’s dream is to have a large store where she can sell a variety of clothing, shoes, and cosmetics, all from a well-established location.

loans.use: Working capital for grocery/firewood business.

loans.name: Osmar Daniel

texts.es: El señor Osmar Daniel, tiene  44 años tiene 1 hijo menor de edad a su cargo. Osmar se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos. Don Osmar dio inicio a su negocio hace 3 años, el dio inicio debido a que el tenia problemas económicos pero su familia lo ayudo para que pudiera establecer un negocio y mantenerse ocupado. Por lo que es un hombre muy responsable y disfruta de su trabajo .El financiamiento será invertido en la compra de alimentos para cerdos y cerdos ya que se acerca una muy buena temporada. El  sueño de él es mantenerse en el negocio, debido a que la competencia es bastante grande, además que desea invertir para terminar de construir su vivienda.
texts.en: Osmar Daniel is 44 years old and has one child in his care.  Osmar works raising and selling pigs.  Osmar started his business 3 years ago because he had financial problems but his family helped him to set up a business and keep himself employed.  He is a very responsible man who enjoys his work.  The loan will be used to buy feed and pigs since a very good season is approaching.  His dream is to stay in business since the competition is quite strong.  He would also like to invest in finishing building his house.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María es una mujer emprendedora, madre de dos hijos, esforzada para lograr el objetivo como profesional
Hoy en día trabaja como técnico quirúrgico en un hospital, su esposo apoyando a la familia el cual trabaja en ventas.
Juntos han logrado levantar su casa toda de concreto lo que han venido logrando junto con Afodenic por medio del financiamiento lo que está feliz ya que su mayor anhelo es la construcción total de su vivienda.
Aun le falta material para terminar como: perlines, zinc, golosos, cemento, arena, y otros para poder concluir un poco más. Lo que está cerca por lograr de pasarse  a su casa.
texts.en: María is an enterprising woman, the mother of two children and works hard as a professional to reach her goal. Today she works as a surgical technician in a hospital. Her husband, who works in sales, supports the family. Together, they have managed to build their concrete house, which has been made possible by financing from Afodenic. She is happy even though her greatest desire is to complete the construction of her home. She still lacks materials to finish such as: braces, zinc, gloss, cement, sand, and other materials to be able to complete a little bit more. Soon she will be able to move into her house.

loans.use: To buy construction materials to finish putting on a roof, and complete her house.

loans.name: Xiomara Del Socorro

texts.es: Xiomara Del Socorro tiene 47 años, es casada y tiene un hijo a su cargo. Ella tiene su negocio que es una pulpería el cual está ubicado en su vivienda. Hace más de 5 años que se dedica a la venta de estos productos, sin embargo fue hasta hace dos años que ha logrado invertir en una gran variedad de productos, buscando de esta manera como incrementar sus ingresos. Ella lo empezó por su esposo el cual también invirtió capital en la apertura del mismo. El crédito será invertido en la compra de mas mercadería que le permitirá incrementar sus ventas y de esta manera su ganancia. Últimamente han tenido muchos problemas relacionados con la inestabilidad en el precio del producto, y es por ello que necesitan financiamiento para cubrir cualquiera de estos problemas. Su sueño siempre ha sido agrandar más su negocio para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo.
texts.en: Xiomara Del Socorro is 47 years old, married and has a dependent child. She has her business which is a grocery store located in her home. She has dedicated herself to the sale of these products for 5 years. However, it wasn't until two years ago that she was able to invest in a variety of products, in this way seeking to increase her income. She started this business through her husband, who also invested capital in opening it. The loan will be invested in buying more merchandise which will allow her to increase sales and her profits. Lately they have had many problems related to the instability in product prices this is why they need funding to cover these problems. Her dream has always been to expand her business to provide a better quality of life for her son.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en: This borrower is 43 years old, married and a mother of three children. The borrower graduated from preparatory school. She will use this loan to purchase an industrial sewing machine and cloth. The borrower has a high reputation in the market. The borrower is capable of raising her family’s income due to the domestic sewing. She has lots of clients due to her experience, good quality, and the reasonable price she charges.

loans.use: For purchasing a sewing-machine & cloth

loans.name: Juana Alicia

texts.es: La señora Juana Alicia tiene 35 años, es madre soltera con un hijo menor de edad. Juana se dedica a la venta de cerdos. Ella dio inicio a este negocio hace 2 años, debido a que ella notó que este tipo de negocio tiene muy buena demanda. A base de allí tomo la decisión de empezar una forma de ganarse la vida de la manera más humilde. En los últimos días la señora ha tenido unos pequeños problemas en cuanto a su matrimonio ya que su esposo la abandono y ella sola con mucho sacrificio ha salido adelante, sin embargo con un su familia que la apoya ha sabido manejar la situación. El crédito será invertido en la compra de  cerdos. Su meta es crecer de una manera abundante y si es posible empezar a tener vendedores que viajen a los departamentos a dejar su producto.
texts.en:
Juana Alicia, 35, is a single mother with a young child. Juana sells pigs. She started her business 2 years ago because she noticed that there was a high demand for this kind of offering.  That's when she decided to earn her living in a simpler way. She has had some problems recently in her marriage, because her husband abandoned her and she has had to get by with many sacrifices. However, her family supports her and she has been able to manage the situation. 

She is going to invest the loan in the purchase of pigs. Her goal is for her business to grow a lot and if it's possible to have sales representatives to distribute her goods in other counties.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en: This borrower is 34 years old and single. He graduated from primary school and has a bakery shop. He will use this loan to purchase a kneader machine with basin and flour. He is a professional and has good experience in this job. He has lots of clients due to his good quality in the market. Most of the owners of restaurants buy bread from him. This loan will help him to increase his production and that will raise his income.

loans.use: For purchasing kneader machine & flour

loans.name: Pablo Cruz

texts.es: Pablo tiene 76 años. El tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar con Fundación, por lo que se encuentra muy agradecido con los financiamientos. Su actividad es brindar el servicio de carpintería es una persona muy responsable pues ha sido un buen cliente. El dio inicio hace más de 45 años, el tiene una gran variedad de clientes que le solicitan diferentes pedidos y reparaciones. El trabaja todos los días desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche, ya que es muy importante para el salir adelante. Por lo que el financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de madera, maque, junco entre otras cosas. Sueña con proporcionarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en: Paul is 76 years old. He has been working with field partner Fundación for a long time and is very grateful for the funding they provide. He works as a carpenter. He is a very responsible person and has been a good client to Fundación. He has been working for 45 years and he has a wide variety of customers who ask for different orders and repairs. He works every day from 8 am to 9 pm, as it is very important for him to succeed. The loan he is requesting will be used to purchase wood, lacquer, rattan, among other things. He dreams of improving his home.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Aurelia Esperanza

texts.es: La señora Aurelia Esperanza tiene 61 años, es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad. Aurelia se dedica a la venta de calzado y ropa, los cuales vende en su casa en un municipio de malpaisillo. Es importante mencionar que, ya la señora tiene 6 años de dedicarse a este negocio, el cual dio inicio vendiendo poca cantidad de mercancías, debido a que lógicamente no tenía la clientela, esto fue debido a que su familia la apoyo para que ella tuviera de donde obtener ingresos, ya que los trabajos están escasos. El crédito será invertido en la compra principalmente de calzado y ropa. Su sueño es mejorar su negocio y brindar estabilidad económica a su familia.
texts.en: Aurelia Esperanza is 61 years old.  She is a single mother and has 3 grown-up children.  Aurelia sells footwear and clothes from her home in the district of Malpaisillo.    Aurelia has been in this business for 6 years.  She started selling a small quantity of merchandise since logically she didn't have a large number of customers.  Her family supported her so that she had a source of income since jobs are scarce.  This loan will be used mainly to buy footwear and clothes.  Her dream is to improve her business and provide her family with financial stability.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Areli Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Areli Del Carmen tiene 32 años es casada y con su esposo tienen un hijo menor de edad. Ella se dedica a una pulpería, entre lo que sobresale golosinas, detergentes, granos básicos, pan y jugos. La señora  tiene 5 años de haber empezado con su negocio, ella inicio en coordinación con su esposo, el cual siempre le preocupo el obtener una fuente de ingreso, poco a poco fue haciéndose de inventario hasta llegar a tener el negocio que hoy en día posee. El crédito será invertido en la compra de mercancías, ya que si compra en este momento y vende en noviembre o diciembre, sus ganancias se incrementan ya que es ahora cuando los precios están bajos. Además ella desea diversificar sus mercancías e introducirse a vender otros tipos de artículos. El sueño siempre ha sido realizar mejoras a su casa, con ello pretende invertirle más a su negocio para que sea más rentable y de allí obtener los recursos para mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Areli Del Carmen is 32 years old, is married and has a child with her husband. She has a grocery store where she sells candy, detergents, basic grains, bread and juice. She started her business five years ago together with her husband who was always worried about obtaining a source of income. She gradually acquired her inventory until she was able to get the business she has today. The loan will be invested in the purchase of goods because if she purchases now and sells in November or December her earnings will increase because prices are low now. Additionally, she wants to diversify her merchandise and start selling other types of goods. Her dream has always been to make improvements to her home. With this aim she wants to invest more in her business to make it more profitable and from there obtain the resources to improve her home.

loans.use: Working capital.
